"Just spend the dance with that man, and I'll change you back...If you want me to." you say as you point towards Dale.

Alice's lip begins to quiver as she looks at Dale, you can't tell if she's trying to cry, or if her body is getting excited. "Excuse me." she says as she walks in his direction.

Getting back to Emily, do another slow dance, as you notice more and more people are gazing at her ass, even as they're dancing with their other girlfriends.

"That's it." you think, "Some of these guys are going to wake up in the morning a few inches and a Y-Chromosome short."
You stop your train of thought for a minute. This isn't like you. This is something a trickster would do. Maybe you exchanged more than just bodies at Brian's place.

Oh well, beggars can't be choosers, your new life is going to be fun.
1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.title: All good things

1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.content:
Your eyes open, and kissing you is a small woman with long red hair. Her body is too short for the clothes she is wearing, and they look baggy and stupid on her.
"Destroy the rose!" yells Brian, and you grab it, rushing off towards the stove. You quickly light it, and throw the rose into an empty sink as you watch it burn. As the rose shrivels and blackens, you turn on the water and stop the fire. The second you do this, you can feel half the mystical energy in the room leave.

"What did you do?" yells the woman, still unable to leave the circle.
"You did it!" says Brian.

You look down at yourself, and realize that you have indeed got your male body back.
"What did you do?" asks the woman as she starts to cry.
"What did you do?" you ask Brian.
"Simple, I took a chance that the rose was the same as the legend, and I was correct. It took all of the alien energies in you and pushed them to the surface. It's what you acted so strange a moment ago. The energy needed somewhere to go, and when you kissed the guy...well girl now I guess...it transferred that energy into him."
"So he changed instead of me?"
"Without the energy, your body couldn't maintain it's transformed state."
"So that's why I am a man again."
"Yes!"
"So what happens to the crying red-head?" you ask.
"Good question. The rose is destroyed, once the energy evaporates, I don't think she'll be able to change."
"So we should keep her here overnight? Isn't that illegal."
"Hey, she's free to go whenever she wants. Assuming she can leave this circle."
"Please, don't leave me like this!" cries the red-head.
"You did this to yourself!" you say.
"Yes sir." the girl says meekly.

Brian stops as he notices this.
"Hey, Alex, I think she's already being mentally affected by the change."
You stop and look at her.
"What's wrong with being trapped like this?" you ask her.
"Nothing, I just don't want be here alone." she says blushing.
"So if I say..." says Brian
"I want you to say." she says looking at you and biting her lip. Her legs are clenched together as looks at you.
"Is she getting turned on?" Brian ask.
"I'm not telling!" you say. (It's none of his business!)
"It seems that the spell that was supposed to make you attracted to her reversed as well." says Brian.
You stay quiet, as you look into the girls loving eyes. When was the last time Emily looked at you like that?

"Come on, lets go, looking at this is pathetic." says Brian, breaking your trance as you both leave his apartment.


THREE DAYS LATER


Your life has gotten back to normal, more or less. You're relationship with Emily is improving, and Tom is hanging around you again. Everything is going fine until one day, you decide to introduce everyone else to Brian.

As you, Tom, Amy and Emily go wait at the meeting place, Brian shows up, with the red-haired girl. On seeing you, she lets out a delighted squeal and runs giving you a hug. You try and nudge her to hint that she should let you go, but she doesn't.
"She calls herself Ginger now." says Brian, almost laughing.
You look at Emily, who seems a bit upset that Ginger is clinging to you.
"So how do you know Ginger?" she asks.
The red-headed girl starts rubbing her cheek against yours.
"I can explain!" you promise.

Both Tom and Brian look at you, certain that you're not going to tell Emily the events that have happened over the last week.
Emily looks into your eyes. She seems to realize that you aren't cheating on her, but is still jealous of the affection this other girl is giving you.

"No you can't." she says.

"No I can't." you admit.
1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.title: A new complication

1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.content:
As you hand over the rose, the shrinking echo of your male self feels all chances of a normal life start to slip away.
"Kiss him!" shouts Brian, and filled with an indescribable attraction to this dark man, you pucker your lips and are about to.
"Stop, whore!" the suitor demands, and you immediately freeze as you lean into kiss him.
"I see that you'll be happier together. The unrequited lust between the two of your eyes should not be denied." says the suitor, talking about you and Brian.
"Be a good bitch and kiss my summoner." says the suitor.
"Oh shit!" says Brian, as he tried to open his door. But using otherworldly powers, the suitor keeps the door shut.
You walk in a trance outside of the chalk circle and head towards Brian.
"Alex, please! Stop!" he shouts as you get closer.
You walk straight up to Brian, and he quickly pushes you to the ground.
"Now that isn't nice, you shouldn't hit a woman." says the suitor, as he uses his telekinetic powers to pin Brian against the wall.
"There is no escaping love!" says the stranger with a laugh as you get up, pulling on his body for leverage, and pressing against it until you two are standing face to face."
"Please Alex! Don't do this! You're a man!" he says.
With come hither eyes, you stare at him, and in the sexiest voice you can possibly manage, you say: "Admit it, that just makes this hotter."

Brian clenches his jaw and you push your lips against him. Eventually massaging his lips enough until they give in and open. You immediately feel his pants push out against your torso, but as quickly as it starts it disappears. You and Alex seem to switch heights, you're growing, while he is shrinking, becoming more slender. Your hair starts to shed, and is immediately replaced by shorter hair. Brian's grows. Soon, you notice that your chest is flat and that it is Brian's that is pushing against you.

Breaking the kiss, you fall back on the floor. And quickly look over yourself, you seem to be completely male again, and cured of the curse. "Brian!" you say to the female pinned against the wall.
"Wow!" says Brian, looking refreshed. He then suddenly snaps to his senses. "Wait, what happened?" he says.
"Now that is more like it!" says the red hair stranger. "This is someone I can break."
"No, wait!" Brian pleads.
"You shouldn't have messed with the gods." says the dark suitor.
"Alex, help!" says Brian as the suitor pulls Brian into the circle with his powers.
You try to stand up, but can't move, the guy's powers are still holding you down.
"Brian!" you yell, but it seems in vain.
"Brittney!" says the dark man to the girl that is now crying in his arms. "I can't wait to make a woman out of you!"
Using his otherworldly powers, the man simultaneously pulls down all the curtains while turning on the lights.
When your eyes adjust, you notice that both the man and Brian (or is it Brittney now?) are gone.

Not sure what to do, you look around the room, still readjusting you your movements, getting used to being male again. Looking through the papers on Brian's desk, you look at one which says: Step 1) Release Alex from curse Step 2) Challange Okil in his own domain Step 3) Use rose to transfer power. Step 4) Wish me luck!

You look at the floor to see that the rose has disappeared along with Brian and the dark suitor. A smile crosses your lips.

"Good luck." you say, as you put down the paper,
1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.title: Brian's plan fails

1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.content:
On hearing these words, something awakens within you. You're not sure if it's a fail-safe built into the curse, or if a higher power has been watching you this entire time and has chosen this moment to work through you. But the one thing that you're sure of is that your next actions are not of your own doing.

"I don't want to be cured." you say.
"Sure you do, trust me Alex, this curse starts to get a lot worse from here on out."
"No..." you say in a more sensual voice, "I don't want you to do this."
"Alex, listen to yourself. It's the curse talking, not you."
You slowly walk towards him, but Brian grabs you by the arms.
"Alex, I'm stronger than you. One of the many problems with your curse. If you're going to be a problem, I'll gag you and lock you in the closet."

Suddenly, your eyes turn the color black. "WEAKNESS IS ONLY PERCEIVED!" says an otherworldly voice coming through you.
Your arms start to struggle with Alex's hold until you break free.
Before you can contemplate what is happening, your hands are on Alex's throat.
"FEEL A TASTE OF ME WEAKNESS LITTLE MAN?" says the voice.
"ALEX...AL..." Brian tries to call your name as he chokes. There must not be too much air left within him.

Left with no other choice, Brian instinctively tries to kick your groin. You feel the hard impact of his foot, but surprisingly there is little pain. Brian starts to kick your kneecaps.

Those hurt.

Your body returns the attack by delivering a swift kick to his balls. Brian's eye's role upwards, and you let go of his neck as he falls to the ground unconscious.

"SEE THE ROSE! BURN THE ROSE!" shouts the demonic voice in your head.
You try to fight it. You try hard to fight it. This rose is your only chance at getting rid of this thing. But unfortunately, your body refuses to listen to you, as finding a match in Brian's kitchen, you light the plant on fire.

Throwing the rose into the sink so that the fire won't spread, your body turns to look at Brian's body on the floor. "DRAG HIM TO HIS BED!" demands the voice.
Your body seems incredibly strong for a woman's as you drag the man to his unmade bed, and toss him on top of the covers.
"Is he alive?" you think.
"HE WILL SURVIVE, IT IS IN MY INTEREST THAT HE DOES."
Suddenly, your body stays frozen and still.
"What do I do now?" you think, feeling a bit more mental control come over you.
"REPLENISH YOURSELF." says the voice.

Immediately, you fall to the floor. You feel pain all over you, and as you try and move your arms, you find that the mockery of feminine strength has returned to you. With extreme pain, you get back on your feet and struggle to get to the kitchen. Whatever happened to you completely took all your energy away.

You stumble to the kitchen and open the fridge, there is an energy drink, that you quickly gulp down. It does nothing. You see cold cuts of ham and eat those, hoping that some protein will slip into your system. But five minutes after you ate, you still feel even weaker.

You crawl to the the sink and try to get a drink of water. Your mouth is parched, but as you turn on the tap and drink as much as you can, the dryness remains. Shutting off the tap, you see that the burnt remains of the rose are sinking into the drain. With it, your best chance to become the man you once were.

Exhausted, defeated, and feeling more guilty, you fall down to the floor, and crawl to the room you left Brian.
"REPLENISH YOURSELF! OR DIE!" shouts the voice in your head.

You look up at Brian, as you see that he is slowly starting to breathe again. You start to crawl towards him as your sight begins to fade black.
Your last thoughts before passing out are...
1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.title: No, you won't give him that chance.

1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.content:
"I want to live!" you think as you crawl towards Brian.

You pass out on the floor, and for a long time there is darkness.








When you wake up, you are completely naked, covered by some light bed sheets. You feel sore, in your pelvis area and look under the sheets to see that there are some small fresh blood stains in the bed. You look to your right in horror to see that Brian is next to you, breathing, but he looks asleep. Your fears die down as you notice he's got his clothes on. A sigh of relief enters your mind as you try and slowly get around the guy without waking him.

But sudden;y, your mind starts to freak out as you try to roll over and feel a sticky warm substance on the side of your hip. Horrified, you look under the sheets once more and notice that Brian's fly as been undone, and his underwear pulled down. His junk is hanging out and standing up.

Your first reaction is to scream, but you stop yourself, terrified that you'll wake up Brian.
Feeling sick, and afraid, you stand up and try to move over Brian, still feeling sore between your legs. You look on the floor, trying hard to find a hint of where your clothes are. You can't see them.

Then suddenly, it hits you, you are walking, you have the energy to move. Your mouth is no longer dry either, although it does feel like it's going to vomit within the next half hour, and your stomach is processing something it's not used to. "It must have been the energy drink and cold cuts of ham...It just had to be." you tell yourself.

Suddenly you notice a note on Brian's desk next to some open library books. The books are highlighted. There is a list with your name on top of the note.

impulse urges
undeserved attraction
More powerful in the dark
Gradual Metamorphosis
Contagious?
Doesn't enter unless invited

Two humanoid monsters combined?

Under the list it Brian writes:

Vampire: A mythical night creature forced to drain blood in order to continue it's existence. Known for limited shape shifting abilities and a slave to its passions. Notable for superhuman strength.

"Vampires are cool, right now. I might be able to survive this. I think Emily might even like vampires." you think, trying desperately to put a positive spin on this for yourself.

Your hope completely dies when you read about the next monster Brian has written in his notes:

Succubus: A female demon whose main drive in life is you steal semen from sleeping men. Known to be overtly sexual, and seductive. They tend to act masculine and aggressive when not attempting the seduce their victim. Also known to have more power during night.

A note below that reads: Perhaps the two monsters were based off of a single creature.

Another note below that one reads: Perhaps Okil is not the myth we're looking for.

The final note on the page says: Condition of vampirism still reversible as long as the host doesn't feed.

Looking down at the swollen slit between your legs, you turn around and see Brian laying alone in bed.
Tears well up in your eyes, as you piece together everything that's happened when you woke. You look at your naked breasts and are horrified that you're stuck this way. As a monster.

You let out a wail and start openly sobbing over the paper, while sitting naked on the chair.

In the distance, buried in your mind, you hear a demonic laugh.
"FOREVER MINE." it says.
1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.title: I want to live

1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.content:
You don't want to live like this, and you remember that Brian said it would only get worse from here. A darkness overtakes you and a cold numbness welcomes your thoughts.

Your mind flashes to all those you'd be a danger to. The body that you no longer possess. The strange voice that controlled you. And all that you can think is "It's good that I leave them."

When you come to, you see cops in the room. They're treating it as a crime scene. Brian is getting carried away on the stretcher, and you are looking down on your own body from the air. (You must be a ghost or something!)

Slowly, you feel yourself floating up towards the roof, as the cops look at your corpse. Then you notice that you're not wearing any pants. (When did you take those off?) A female cop pokes the bottom of your underwear with a pencil. "She was on her period." the cops says to her partner. "Well, that explains everything." says the other cop, and they both have a laugh. Your body must have started that function sometime after you passed out.

"Great." you think in a sarcastic tone, "One final humiliation before I leave this world."

It seems that you can't even catch a break in death. Your body floats higher until it passes through the roof and you float towards a giant beam of light.

Well, it looks like another adventure is just starting for you, but your last one has come to its final conclusion.
1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.title: Maybe it's better this way

1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.content:
Not only are you embarrassed about what happened, you have the distinct feeling that Brian is keeping something from you. "No, nothing worth noting. I went straight to your place and slept until we bumped into each other." you lie, as you sit down and cross your legs.
"Really? That's odd, according to my findings, you should have been displaying more...impulsive tendencies." says Brian, trying to be political about this whole situation.
"No." you lie again. "Why, is there something I should know?"
"I'm just working on a theory, it's not important." says Brian.
"Oh."

You stay quiet, there is nothing that you can think of to improve the situation you're in. So silence seems the best choice.
The male version of yourself would have at least tried to think up a joke to lighten the mood, but in your new form, you're not into comedy as much. (Although you'll never admit that to anyone.)

"There!" says Brian, pointing at one of his papers.
"What is it?"
"I think I know what's going on."
"Really? So you mean you were guessing until this point?" you ask.
"No, but judging the information I've gotten from you, I think I've found your condition!" says Brian.
"Great! What is it?" you ask.
Briant closes the book and moves around the papers on his desk. "Trust me, you're not ready for this!" he exclaims.

"Look at me? How much more ready can I be?" you ask trying to accentuate the curves you your figure.
"Think about what you just said."
"How much more ready can I be?" you repeat, trying to see what's so important about the words.
"You said it while pointing to your genitalia." Brian says.
"So?" you ask.
"It has a double meaning Alex. It's suggesting you want sex." Brian says.
"NO!" you say defensively, surprised at how loud you just sounded.
"You don't want sex with me. You just want sex with someone." Brian says.
"You're disgusting. This is getting uncomfortable, and I'm going to leave."
"But is that you talking?" asks Brian.

You close your eyes and think about it. But slowly an image appears in your head, and you see that you are in the bathroom you were in the dream, the woman who looked like a sex crazed version of you is laying down in the haze, and you're leaning over her. Looking down at your own naked body, you realize that you're inhabiting your male self in your thoughts.

That's when it hits you, you've been in complete control since you've had that dream. You see the female moaning (in a sound somewhere between pain and pleasure) on the floor, and suddenly, you snap out of the image and open your eyes.

"I am in complete control!" you say defiantly to Brian.
"That's great! Now get off me." Brian tells you as you see that he's pinned to the floor...by your hands!
"I'm sorry." you say, as you both get back up. "What happened?"
"You went silent, told me to 'come here' and threw me to the floor and you rubbed yourself against me."
"I did?" you say in a voice that sounds frightened and innocent.
"What was going through your head?" asks Brian.

There is a pause. You figure its about time you tell Brian what happened, but you can't. That's when it hits you, your free choice was an illusion from the second you woke up today!

"What's the matter?" asks Brian.

Your head spins and you think, you find yourself back in your dream, as you look up and see your naked male body looking at you from the floor. You don't want it to touch you, but it starts leaning over. (Is it trying to help?) "Go away!" you try and warn it. But all that comes out is a semi-sexual moan. "I can't be this dumb." you think, but the truth is, you were too chivalrous.

You male self leans over to touch you, to make sure you were okay, but the second that his hand touches you, he lets out a scream, as he becomes some hideous human/liquid hybrid and starts to be absorbed into you. A second later, the haze clears up and you feel energized. You look into the mirror to see that you're now naked. (Something that you inherited from your male self.) Looking into the mirror, you find that you look great and aren't ashamed of your body. That's when you realize that even in your head, this creature, your female id, has taken control. You are now little more than a passenger of your own thoughts.
1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.title: Don't tell him anything

1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.content:
You flash back to reality and see Brian's corpse laying down on the floor in front of you.
"Brian! Are you okay?" you say as you kneel down shaking him. You then notice that you are holding a broken vase in your right hand. Tossing it aside. You shake Brian a bit more.
"Brian? What happened? Did I do this?!" you ask frantically.
Brian begins to speak. (Thank god he's not dead.) "Yur....Yura..." he mutters.
"Yura? Whose Yora?" you ask.
"You're a suck..."
"YOU ARE...You're saying you're...Me...I am...I'm a what? you ask Brian."
"Suck..."
"I suck. Oh, I totally suck if I did this to you!" you begin to sob."
"Yura suck ubi..." Brian struggles to say.
"I'm stuck up? I'm stuck here?" you frantically try and figure out.
"You're a succu...bitch." says Brian before he can't say anymore.
"Did he just call me a bitch with his last breath?" you think.

You see Brian laying on the ground with an incredibly stupid look on his face. His eyes are closed, but his mouth is partially open and his lips seem to be semi-puckered.

You look at his body, unsure if he is alive or dead, and something comes over you. You don't know if it's instinct, or if you owe him one on this is the only way to can repay him, but you crawl over his body, look straight over his head, and lean down to give him a last kiss. It feels weird, but as you make contact, you can't seem to stop yourself. After about 15 seconds of kissing, you pull your head back, and notice that some drool is hanging from your lip.

You get up, and see that Brian's mouth has altered into a smile as the last of life leaves his body. You're not even thinking over anything right now, except leaving this future crime scene. Without even directing it's actions your body is moving on its own, locking the door as it leaves. You move towards the bus stop, making sure all the guys see you as you head for a clothing store. You're going to get a dress, because you have to star in a dance tonight.
1211111111111111111111111112111121111121.title: Back to Brian

choices: Oh, who are we kidding?  Things get worse!
1211111111111111111111111112111121111122.content:
Well, you look at the events posters on the wall, and as luck would have it, there are no crappy events to give away prizes. "It figures." you think. However, it's not like you were planning on doing something embarrassing, like participating in a wet T-shirt contest, right? (Although, with your current attire, you'd stand a chance at winning it.)

The rest of the day is spent, trying to find some tickets being given away. Not surprising, there is no luck.
As night hits you finally give in, shed your pride and call Dale.

You get on the phone and dial his number.
"Hi Dale!" you say in a cheery girlish voice.
"Oh hi Alex." says Dale's voice.
"I missed you." you playfully say.

You look out your window and realize it's night now, feeling a certain area of your dress, you find out that you are once again totally female. (Funny, you didn't even notice you'd change.)
"Listen Alex..."
"Yes?"
"I waited until 6pm for you to call." he says.
"Sorry, I was making dinner. I love to cook!" you lie, trying to sound more domesticated.
"Ya, well, you didn't seem that into me today, and I was sure you wouldn't call so I..."
"You DIDN'T?!" you gasp.
"I kind of asked another girl out."
"Oh...okay." you say, trying to sound disappointed. (You get slightly depressed when you realize you didn't have to try that hard.)
"So, no hard feelings." says Dale.
"Goodbye." you say as you hang up the call.

With your best chance at going to the mall gone, you go outside for some fresh air. You're not planning to walk far, but you feel so constricted in your room and new body. You need a change.

Going outside, you look at some sinister looking clouds beginning to cloud up the moon.

"Well, at least things couldn't get any worse." you think.
1211111111111111111111111112111121111122.title: Go find another way to get the tickets

1211111111111111111111111112111121111122.content:
You're only about fifty yards from your buildings front door, when you hear a voice behind you.
"Well, well, well, if it isn't my favorite chick with a dick." says a familiar sounding voice.
You turn around in surprise, and see your harasser from the mens' stall.
"You!" you let out a quick yelp, but before you can release a fully formed scream, the guy sticks his palm over your mouth, and pulls a knife against you.

The sky gets darker.
"You made me look like a fool in front of my homeboy." he snarls. "I play the fool, you pay the price!"
You try and mumble something, but it's pointless, his grip is too tight!
"What's that bitch? What's that?!" says the attacker as he caresses his knife along your thigh."
You feel as the knife moves around to the front of your legs, and the man's arm tense up as he's prepared to you it.
"I'm gonna make sure you never use my bathroom again.

In the distance you see a tall man, you squirm around a bit, trying hard break free, but the guy just holds you tighter.
Expecting to feel testicles, the jolts his knife forward, but only hits air.
"What?!" says the guy in surprise. With this shock, his grip loosens and you manage to bite just below his index finger. With this he pulls back his hand and you manage to get away.
"Beat you to it!" you say triumphantly.

Then your survival instincts kick in, and you run towards the stranger coming towards you. What can you yell to get his attention? Help, no, yell FIRE! wait, yell RAPE! Ya, do the last one, that's sure to get you some attention and sympathy. But as you open your mouth to scream, you can't.

You just look at the stranger as he strolls towards you, and you feel compelled to stop.
As you stay still, the man comes over to you and lifts up your chin, examining you from every angle.
"You're not ripe." he hisses.

Behind you, the man from the bathroom comes running at the stranger.
"Yo, leave us man! Bitch is mine!" he says.
"Leave now and I will not harm you!" the man says in an eerie tone.
"Shit, you ain't the boss O me!" shouts the attacker.
1211111111111111111111111112111121111122.title: Oh, who are we kidding?  Things get worse!

1211111111111111111111111112111121111122.content:
Without warning, the guy with a knife charges at the stranger, and a fight breaks out. You want to run and scream, but some power is forcing you to stay still. You can't even turn around to see how the fight is going. Hearing some scuffling sounds, you wince as the stranger sounds like he's been stabbed.

The stranger laughs as he gets back up. "I like you!" he bellows."
"What?!" says the man, shocked.
"What?" you think.
"If she means that much to you, take her. The female is not my type." he says.
"Seriously?"
"Seriously?!"
"She's all yours." says the stranger with a twinkle in his eye.
"You do know what I'm going to do to her!" says the attacker.
"I can only imagine." laughs the stranger.
(You really don't want to imagine."

Cautiously, the attacker walks up to you and pulls you over to the treeline. "Now where were we?" he asks.
But the second he lifts his knife up, an invisible power knocks it out of his hand.
"The hell? I can't move!" he yells.
"So much spunk. Such character." laughs the stranger.
"What are you doing?" asks the man as you place your right hand on his cheek.
You don't answer, you can't. The same power that is holding him is holding you. You feel you left arm go around his back as your right leg wraps around his waist. This forces you forward as you lean against him.
You both see what's coming next, but not wanting to, you squeeze your eyes shut.
"No!" says the attacker, as you both fall to the ground as your lips meet.
Struggling to get up, the force that takes hold of you forces you to make out for a minute on the ground.

Turning over on your back, you look up and see the stranger hold his arm out to help you up. Seeing as if you have no choice, you accept his help.
When you stand up, the first thing that you notice is that you're taller. The stranger smiles at you. You look down and see that you're a man again. You're still wearing that stupid dress, but you're male.

You look on the ground beside you and see a woman laying there looking up at the two of you. She looks like she could be the attacker's twin sister.
"I can't get up!...My voice!" yells the girl.

You look down at yourself again, happy to be you.
"What?...Why?" you ask the stranger.
"Because, this girl is more my time." says the stranger with a wink as he kneels down over the shocked woman.
"Leave now, you will not be harmed." says the stranger.

You take one last look at the woman, whose features are now way to delicate to look tough.
"Dude, yo can't leave me like this!" he pleas.
"Hey, you came after me tonight expecting only one of us to return home with our testicles. Irony's a bitch." you say as you walk away.
And just before you walk out of her hearing range, you add: "And now you're one too."

Flipping him the middle finger, you go back you your apartment and get out of the stupid dress.

You are so burning that thing in the morning.
1211111111111111111111111112111121111122.title: Two guys fighting over you

12111111111111111111111111121111212.content:
As you open your eyes, long strands of your hair seem to cover them. You brush it aside as your slender frame gets up out of bed and stumbles towards the bathroom. Despite eating less than usual, you feel a bit bloated. You look in the mirror and see that you have tiny bags building under your eyes. You try and make a frowning face, but it just looks cute. Your facial features have slightly altered overnight. Your lips seem a bit fuller as your nose seems more slender. Your chin is even less squared than usual.

You hate your reflection and want to punch it. You make a fist and shake it at the mirror. You want to break the mirror, but are afraid of it hurting your hands. The weight on your chest is pulling you forward, but as you straighten yourself, you notice that you're half a foot smaller than yesterday. All you can think about is how much your life sucks right now. You're not attractive, and Emily wouldn't like to see you like this. You want to tear someone's head off.

You brush your teeth to get rid of the morning breath, and then realize that after eating breakfast, you'd just have to brush them again. The answer is simple; don't eat breakfast.

Getting dressed, your throw on the tightest pair of jeans you own, which are too long for you. using a safety pin to shorten the legs up, you throw on your windbreaker and walk out into the cold morning.

You don't look pretty, hot, or handsome. Today, you look like someone that the world doesn't want to mess with. Tucking your lengthened hair into your coat collar, you head out on campus.

Not really sure where you're going, you walk for about ten minutes until you notice that someone is following you.
12111111111111111111111111121111212.title: moodier than usual

121111111111111111111111111211112121.content:
Through the corner of your eye, you spot Emily.
Emily? What is Emily doing following you? You sit down on a bench and let her come closer to you. You don't want to talk to her, but something inside of you says you'll regret it if you don't.

Emily approached.

"Alex?" she says as she waves at you.
"Sorry?" you reply, almost on instinct.
You see that Emily is scanning you over. Her eyes focus on your chest and long hair.
"Staring at something?" you say in a bitchy tone.
"What, no, sorry. You just remind me a lot of someone." she says in a shrinking voice.
"Oh, stare away." you say in a harsh manner.
"Know what, I'm sorry. I honestly thought you were a friend of mine." she says before leaving.

As she walks away, you catch her taking a look or two over her shoulder.

After she walks out of site, you stand up again. You don't know why you treated Emily like that, but you're feeling hostile to her today.
You don't know why, but you just want someone to hug you and tell you you'll be okay. But for some reason, you can't let the rest of the world know you need that.

This new attitude of yours is complicated.
121111111111111111111111111211112121.title: Bitchy to Emily

1211111111111111111111111112111121211.content:
Finally deciding to get something to eat, you order a salad, sit down and puncture it with your plastic fork. You chew on the meal for 6 minutes, despite the fact that you'd usually eat a salad that size in under two minutes. Maybe the fact that it was five dollars makes you try and savor the bites. (Stupid campus pricing.)

After you eat, you just sit at your empty table and watch the others. You don't know why buy your eyes keep drifting towards the female faces. You're mind is taking notes about how good their smoky eyes look, how their eyeliner contrasts with their lip gloss. You're starting to piece together how they're dressing and doing up their hair. It's all done to help promote their sexuality, their differences from men.

Most of them seem to be having a good time, the girls are talking to each other, but many of them look tired. You note that the less makeup a girl is wearing, the more tired she looks. You catch your reflection in a nearby slate of glass. You look pretty tired too. And your stupid hair is all over the place. It looks like you've just rolled out of bed.

Suddenly, a girl sits across from you. You shoot her a glare.
"Can I sit here?" she asks.
"Free country." you shrug.

"My name is Samantha." she says as she opens some containers of food in front of her.
"I'm Alex." you say. You don't want to talk to this girl, something seems off about her. But you also don't feel like moving anymore than you have to at the moment.
"I haven't seen you on campus before." says Sam.
"It's a big campus." you reply.

You're hoping that Samantha takes a hint with your short responses. Your hope is futile.

"I know, I was taking classes all over the place, it takes me fifty minutes to walk from one class to another. Sometimes by the time I get to the class, it's already ended." she says.
For the next five minutes, Samantha talks almost no stop. You try and keep your sanity by focusing on other people. Eventually, you go back to paying attention to her once you notice yourself staring at some guys crotch. (Did you just lick your lips?)
"...So what do you think?" asks Samantha.
"Um, I think, you're right?" you say, guessing that that was the appropriate response.

Samantha's eyes start to quiver a bit, she seemed desperate for an answer. Her lips start shaking too, as starts to whimper.
1211111111111111111111111112111121211.title: Samantha

12111111111111111111111111121111212111.content:
Before you can take in what's happening, tears start to go down Samantha's eyes. "I'm sorry, I'm so sorry, I suck at this." says Samantha as she buries her face in her palms. You just sit there looking dumbstruck as it seems everyone in the area has their eyes on the two of you. Not knowing what do do, you reach over the table and place your hand on her shoulder.

"Why am I doing this?" she asks.
"Doing what?" you say.
She just keeps sobbing,
"You can stop crying now." you say.
"I...I...can't." she wines.

At this point, you're convinced everyone is staring at the two of you.
"We're going to the washroom." you tell her.
The two of you get up and walk towards the ladies room. You feel some hesitation opening up the door, this seems to be just another milestone in losing your manhood. It opens with a creek. And you're introduced to a room with three sinks, five stalls and a giant mirror that stretched from one end of the wall to the other. They even have a condom machine...no, wait...that's a tampon dispenser.

You look back and see that Samantha seems just as hesitant to enter as you do. (Maybe she's just embarrassed.) The door closes, and some woman who was putting on lipstick, quickly finishes up and walks out of the area. Apparently there are some unspoken rules that are taking place here.

You grab some paper towels and pass them to Samantha. "Blow your nose on these," you say.
Samantha blows her nose, and starts to wipe away her running mascara. She's doing a lousy job at it.
"Can you help me? I don't really know how to clean this off." she says.
You just stare at her stupefied.
"Didn't you mother teach you how to do this?" you ask her.
"My mother is dead." she says as she starts crying again.
"Sorry."

Samantha keeps crying.
"It's never going to work." she says.
"What's not?"
"This. This." she says pointing at herself as she sobs. "I don't know how you do it."

You want to comfort her, but you can't help but noticing her large cleavage jiggling as she sobs. Her cleavage is pretty exposed, especially for this time of year. You kind of feel guilty for noticing, but you can't help but smile. You're proud of yourself for noticing those.

You're starting to piece this situation together.
"Sam, is there something you want to tell me?" you ask.
"You wouldn't understand." she says as you look at her.
"I think I would." you tell her.
"No, you wouldn't." she responds.

Finally, you decide to come right out and say it.
"You're really a man. Or at least you were one." you tell her.

For a second, Samantha just looks at you stunned.
12111111111111111111111111121111212111.title: Bathroom talk

121111111111111111111111111211112121111.content:
Samantha just looks at you stunned.
"You knew?" she finally whispers to you.
"How did you know? I thought I looked perfect." she says while looking at herself to see if anything was off.

You might have enjoyed making her squirm some more, but you're really not in a good mood today. You just want to get the day over with and head back to sleep.

"I know. I've been hit by the same plague, so to speak."
She looks at you, and closely examines your face.
"Now that you mention it, it's so obvious." Samantha gasps.
"Want to tell me how this happened?" you ask her.
"Not here." she says, her eyes rolling towards two feet behind a closed bathroom stall.

You let out a quick smirk, thinking of the conversation the woman in that stall was listening too.
"I'll take you to my room." you tell Sam as she grabs her purse and leaves.

Thirty minutes pass and you are sitting cross legged on your bed watching Sam cross her legs over her desk chair.
Sam managed to wash the running make up off her face and at least looks a bit presentable.
"Now, tell me how you got like this." you say.
Samantha takes a deep breath.
"I hated my life. I wasn't gay, but I sucked with girls. I didn't know my own strength and kept destroying things. I was over six feet tall, and people just didn't trust me. I could smell there intimidation awhile away. One night at a bar, I met this girl. She thought like me. She knew exactly what was going on in my head, and we started hanging out together. She seemed strange though, because no matter how much she flirted with me, she would never do anything more than touch. One day, I felt like she was the one. I told her and she freaked out. She said she couldn't and was going to leave me."

Samantha hangs her head down, tears seem to form at the bottom of her eyes.

"I begged her to stay, but she said only if we could still be friends. I told her I didn't want her as a friend." she says.

Samantha looks back at you and forces a smile. "This sounds so weird when I say it out loud, in this voice."

She continues: "I told her I wanted to be part of her. To be with her and have a life together. I had known her for less than a week. But it felt so right. She told me that she had a disease. That was it, a disease that crippled her and made her weaker, more unstable. That she'd be harder to live with as she got older. I told her again that I didn't care. In the heat of the moment we made love. She seemed so unsure at first, it was so cute. But as we went on, she didn't want to stop. She refused to, and, well, things got kinkier from there. Naked and exhausted, we both fell asleep. I woke up to find her dead the next morning. Witnesses said she jumped in front of a bus. The next night, I woke up like this. And had been trying to adapt ever since."

She starts crying again, and you pass her some Kleenex.

"How long ago did this happen?" you ask.
"About a month."
"And you instantly changed? Like, you were like this for both night and day?"
"Yes...why?"

Not thinking that staying silent was an option. (You're obviously not in your right mind today.) You tell her your story up to this moment.

"You know what the sad part is?" she says. "I think I secretly wanted this. Mom always treated my sisters better."

You find yourself just staring at her. Sam is better looking than you, but that's not saying much.

"Why would you want this? My life was fine until this happened. Now I'm all mixed up." you say.
"I needed a change. I was unhappy. Like, really unhappy. This is nothing short of a miracle. Of course, it's nothing like I thought it'd be either. I was never brought up being taught the little things most girls are." Sam answers.
121111111111111111111111111211112121111.title: You're right (for once)

choices: Try and keep an eye on Samantha yourself
1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.content:
"So are you looking for a way to solve this?" you ask Sam.
Sam seems to be in as deep thought as she can manage for a second. "I don't know." she responds.
You know you want things to get back to normal. At least you're pretty sure you do. You really don't want to end up like Sam, someone who sucks at being feminine and is desperate for attention.

"I know a friend who can help you find out what happened. Would you like to meet him?"
"Him?!" Sam says in excitement.

After a short phone call, you find yourself at Brian's apartment.
"Alex." Brian says.
"Brian." you respond.
"You're new friend was a man too." Brian says calmly on seeing Sam.
"How do you guys know that?!" yells Sam in frustration.
"Did you infect her?" Brian asks you.
"No!" you respond.
"Ouch. Just checking." Brian jokes as you punch him in the shoulder.

Sam tells her story again, and Brian comments on how moody you are. (And secretly, you're kind of flattered he noticed.) Brian than goes to his books.
"I found this out last night." he says as he begins to sum up what's on paper. "There is this demon called Clafathios. He was an old god, like pre-history. They only found his name about three years ago etched in stone on an old sacrificial temple. Anyways, he was the dominant patriarchal god of this civilization. The problem was that none of the other goddesses wanted to have his children, because he was so repulsive and sexist. But being male, he did want to get laid, so he went after Earth women. The other goddesses didn't want him to do this. So they joined forces and put a spell of protection on the woman. This pissed off Clafathios, so he started to go after the men and bring them back with him. Of course, wanting straight sex, he changed the men into his ideal version of women, then got them to have his kids."
"Ew." you say in disgust.
"Wait, so you think that we might be his brides?" ask Sam.
"It's just another old legend I came across. It would explain your lack of transformation, compared to Alex here."
"I'm still technically male." you tell Sam.
"Wait, what do you mean ideal woman?" you ask Brian.
"It doesn't specify. I'm assuming passive, submissive, curvy, dumb. Stuff like that, since he was a the main patriarch of this lost religion, and, the writings say he had sexist traits."
"So do you think that we could be dealing with two different gods who turn guys into...us?" you ask.
"Well, the idea of having no recorded metamorphoses in history and then you two suddenly changing does seem coincidental. I mean very coincidental...It's possible we're not dealing with a myth at all here, but a new virus. Alex, when it was just you, I thought it might be a glitch in nature, but with Sam here. It could be that bigger things are going on. You both might want to see a doctor, like immediately."
"Wouldn't they lock us away and probe all our holes?" asks Sam.
"Or say we're insane?" you add.

"Yes. Those are risks. But two of you like this in the same place, it just seems like you should take precautions." says Brian.

You and Sam walk out of his apartment.
"Sorry I wasn't more help." says Brian as he shuts the door."
"Your friend Brian is cute." says Samantha.in a girly voice.
"I haven't noticed." you respond.

Great, now you know your situation is no longer unique. You play your options in your head. You can either go to see a doctor about this, or you can sit on it for a while and study Samantha yourself. She looks like she could use a friend, and she's been cursed longer than you have. Maybe you can learn from her mistakes.
1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.title: Seeing Brian Again

1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.content:
"We've put this off long enough. I think we need to see a doctor." you tell Sam.
"Are you sure? I'm pretty sure that the textbooks don't say anything about our condition."
"Well, maybe it's rare enough they they didn't think that it'd be worth mentioning." you reply.
"Maybe." says Sam, starting to warm to your idea.
"We'll go to the campus clinic, get checked out there." you tell her.
"Fine. Maybe we should see if there is a medical reason for all of this." she finally says.

The walk down to the clinic is a quick one. The lady at the desk looks at the two of you. "What can I do for you two ladies?" she says.
"I'm a guy." you say.
"Oh, sorry honey." she says, as she takes a second look at you.
"It's okay, he takes it as a compliment." Sam says.
"So what can I do for you two?" she asks.
"I need to check out some cramps I've been having." you say.
"I need to see why my estrogen level has been rising." Sam says.

"Are you two together?" the lady asks.
"Sure." you say.

A handsome doctor comes in, but despite his looks, he's not that competent.
"Um..Excuse me, sir?" he says looking at your body.
"It's okay, most people look twice." you say.
"Um...are you a hermaphrodite." he asks.
"I don't have a female reproductive system." you say.
"Oh...it's...never mind then. Just open your mouth, and I'm going to take a swab of your spit."
You do so, and he takes the sample.

"I'll be back in a minute." he says.
Half an hour later, you look out and the hallway looks deserted.
"Um..hello?" you say as you open the door and climb out.
You hear a radio, and some muffled voice speaking in it.
Then before you know what happens, you're hit from behind. "I've got the subject." says the voice.
It's the last thing you hear before you pass out.
1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.title: Go see a Doctor

1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.content:
You wake up drugged, your limbs are tied down to a table. You are naked and unable to move.
You feel groggy. "She's coming around." says one of the scientists.
"What's..." you try and say, but a moan is all that comes out.
"Hello? Can you hear me?" says a guy in a medical mask, holding your eye open.
"Pupils are dilating. Subject is conscious."
You moan again.
"Subject unable to respond." says the guy in the mask.
Another one holds a needle up to you.
"Mam, I'm going to inject you with a little concoction." he says.
You feel the needles sting, as whatever is in it is injected into you.
You moan, it sounds almost sexual. You see your breasts inflate until they feel like exploding, and then deflate as they morph back into your chest.
"Where does the milk go?" on guy asks.
As you answer his question, you feel your bladder release.
"Subject has pissed itself." says the scientist.
"Subject is male." says the scientist.
Ironically, you feel weaker. The doctor pinches you with another needle.
"That's got nutrition." he says.
"I'm cured! Why aren't they letting me go?" you think.

The doctors leave and you lay on the table alone. At least you're male again.
Two hours later, the doctors return.
"Mummph, fffth, mmpth." you say.
"The drugs will last a day, the scientists says.
"Mhhhh." you mumble.
"Ready doctor?" the person beside you says.
"Ready for the third go." says the scientist.
"Ready." says a young woman.
"Mhhh!!!" you mumble as someone sticks a needle into inner calve.
"We need to get this during the transformation." says another scientist.
You begin to transform again. Your body convulses again, and your chests inflates, and your genitals disappear inside of you. Your skin is getting smoother again. And out of the corner of your eye, you see one of the scientists getting a hard on as they take the blood sample from you.
"Get this to main." says the scientist, passing another person a needle with your blood in it.
"Subject has transformed to base position." a scientist says a minute later.
"When will this end?" you think.
1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.title: In a lab

choices: Find out what happens to you
1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.content:
You are eventually released from the table, but kept in a small glass room, with a toilet, a light bulb, and a pillow. The glass is made up of a one way mirror. So you can only see your naked self, but others can see you.
"Hello?" you occasionally yell as you hear whispers from behind the mirror. "I know you're there."
You just instinctively know that the people behind the mirror are noting ever move you are making. Turns out you're right. They see how you react to different situations when your male and female.
Occasionally you're given food. You know it's drugged, but if you don't eat it, they'll just gas you and stick protein needles into you.

Finally, you just give up and lay down on the table, ready to die, when someone comes in...in a bio-hazard suit.
"Hello, miss. I'm Dr. Pennington. I feel that we owe you an explanation."
"You're damn right you do. And I'm a man. Call me sir or mister." you say.
"Sorry mam. Do to the nature of these tests, I am only allowed to refer to you by the title that society would give you." says the doctor. "The tests we're done on you found that you were highly contagious and that you were a level three hazard. Any fluid from your body, sweat, piss, blood, spit, had the potential to infect any male you came into contact with."
"And you solved it." you say with some hope in your voice.
"We've made you less contagious, yes. Only your blood could possibly affect someone."
"So there is no need for me to be here." you say.
"It's not that simple. While you were able to change back and forth, between sexes, all samples we've taken from you were only able to transfer once. Although the subject was not contagious."
"So why are you telling me all this?" you ask.
"Because your body has stabled out in the last day. He can inject you and force your body to become male, but the changes barely last an hour."
"So you're telling me I'm stuck as a miss?" you say.
"Well, you could always warn the title of Doctor or Mrs." says the doctor with a chuckle. "Sorry, medical humor. I'm saying is that we no longer need to keep you here."
"That's great, so I can go home." you say.
"No, you're still to valuable to be left in the public by yourself."
"When what's the deal?" you ask.
"It's not like you have a choice." says the doctor.
1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.title: Two days later

1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.content:
"Bring them in." says the doctor, as a man brings in a duffel bag and throws it at your feet.
"What's this for?" you ask, unzipping the bag.
Inside you look and see a lot of bright sunny dresses. There's even a bra, some make-up, a purse, and a box of tampons.
"Those are items you'll need for your new life." says the doctor.
"Why aren't there any pants?" you say.
"Pants weren't in our budget. These were donated by wives and girlfriends of the staff here," says the doctor.
You look at Dr. Pennington silently as you hold up the tampons.
"Those are for taking samples of your blood." he says.
"And the make-up?" you ask.
"Also donated, most of it is hardly used."
"But why would I need it?" you ask.
"If, you want to feel pretty."
"But no one can see me, I'm not going out in public. You said I wasn't allowed to go back into the public."
"You're not. But, you're going to be allowed to live on a private island. Donated to you by one of our generous benefactors. It's got a tropical climate, a beach side home, and you can spend your days on the beach in the sun."
"Does it have internet?" you ask.
The doctor turns around and whispers to people behind the mirrors. "Yes." he says.
"And you'll just leave me on this island for the rest of my days?" you ask.
"You wouldn't be alone. We'd have one of our many agents there with you, to make sure nothing happened. In fact, bring in Dave." Dr. Pennington says, turning around.
A minute later, a six and a half foot tall guy named Dave walks into the room.
"Hi," says Dave, reaching out to shake your naked hand.
"Dave will be going undercover as your husband. In case you're island has any unexpected visitors."
"I don't like him!" you immediately say.
"Your body betrays you." says Pennington.
You look down to see that your nipples have perked, and your groin has become a bit wet from Dave's touch. (Right, you're naked. Kind of easy to forget that after two days of being bare.)
"Can't I just stay here?" you ask.
"No. We need to decontaminate this room, then use it for other subjects. I could transfer you to another lab, but trust me, it's nowhere near as nice as this one."
You sigh, defeated.
1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.title: Find out what happens to you

1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.content:
You're on the tropical island. And if you weren't a woman, it would have been paradise. The government gave you a diploma, so your time at the campus wasn't a total waste. The only thing is that the name of the document says 'Alexandra.'

You spend a lot of time on the beach, working on your tan, and reading bad romance novels. While you admit that romance novels are garbage, they're kind of like porn for woman, and get the job done. Plus no other books are on this island. And they lied, there is no internet. Although Dave has access to a two way phone that links directly the lab, if the need to call someone arises.

Dave isn't that bad of a guy. Most the time he's working out or preparing dinner. You're kind of convinced that he's gay, and don't feel threatened by him. The only problem is that sensors on buoys around the island let him know if a boat is nearby. When they go off, he immediately forces you a drug, that makes you quiet and compliant. (Kind of like a stronger version of Prozac.)

Dave tries to be nice. But spending too much time with anyone starts to make them look attractive. So you're conversations consist of two word exchanges.

The lab gets doctored pictures of you and occasionally sends emails of you to your friends and family. Most of them think you're had a change of heart, really found god, and are building orphanages for Africa.

Well, at least the fictional version of you is doing something worthwhile with his life.
1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.title: Six months later

1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.content:
"Hey Sam. I was thinking we should get to know each other better."
"Really?"
"Yes. Do you want to stay at my place tonight, we can watch some movies...and you know, talk or whatever."
"That's be awesome. You'd be my first friend, since, this happened." she says.

You set up a time to meet, then sneak into your classes for the day. Once you take some notes, you return to your room.
It's around seven when Samantha shows up.
"Knock, knock." she says, opening the door.
"Hi," you say, letting her in. Sam looks really weird, she's wearing a black mini-skirt and has her hair done. She's wearing tennis shows, and a white blouse under a brown leather jacket.
"Are you wearing nylons?" you ask.
"They're a pain not to rip, but they feel so good." Sam says.
"If you were a guy, would you pick me up?" she asks.
Not wanting to hurt her feelings, you mumble the word "sure." and then go onto put on a movie.

"Why are we watching an action film?" she asks.
"Because I like action." you say as the twentieth faceless henchman dies on screen.
"It's stupid."
You don't want to admit it, but it kind of is stupid. You're more bored than anything watching it. It's not getting your testosterone or adrenaline pumping like it should. Sam seems to like ripped abs of the main hero, but your looking at her more than the screen. She probably doesn't even notice, but she's mouthing something to the movie. You can lipread the word 'babies.'

"I'm sorry. This is stupid, do you want to watch something else?" you ask.
"Your hair's longer!" Sam says in surprise.
You quickly feel your hair, and notice that the sun has gone down completely. The transformation was so subtle this time that you didn't even notice it. Physically, you're fully female now.
"Oh, that happens." you say.
"It looks good. Can I do something with it?" she asks as she takes a brush out of her purse.
"Sure." you say, still a bit moody.

The next fifteen minutes are humiliating, at least they would be if you were male. Samantha talks about many of the experiences she's had since she changed, and the knots in your hair get straightened out. You hate to admit it, but having her babble on about useless subjects while brushing your hair is relaxing.

The two of you watch a chick flick, and you actually swoon. You didn't even know you could swoon. Thankfully, Samantha doesn't notice. After the film is done, Samantha offers to paint your nails. What scares you is that you almost agree to it.

"I've got a better idea..." you say.
1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.title: The Girly Slumber Party for Two

1211111111111111111111111112111121211111.content:
"Really?" asks Sam.
"Really. I'm tired, this stuff is harder than I thought it would be."
"Can I stay?" Sam asks, looking at Tom's bed.
"Sure." you say, wanting to go to bed.

Sam tries to talk to you for an hour, but it's about her dizzy thoughts and you give short and concise answers.
The then fall asleep, and have some dream about a dark stranger in shadows laughing at you.

You wake up and feel different. You look at your hands, and notice that your nails have been painted last night. You wipe the drool off your mouth and notice a red smudge has wiped off on your hand. You walk over to Tom's bed and see that Sam has left you. You walk towards the bathroom mirror and see that your face is a brightly colored mess. You face is full of poorly applied make up. You look like a ten year old who just found her mother's cosmetics, and rushed to try them all on.

You're about to wash it off, when there is a knock on your door. Looking in the mirror, you figure that no one would recognize you like this anyway. You open the door to see a rather attractive looking woman, who is wearing men's clothes. "Are you Alex?" she says. "Yes." you respond.
"Wow. It happened to everyone on this floor." said the girl. "Who are you?" you ask. "I am Jeff." she says.

"How, why?" you ask.
"I don't know. The whole campus just woke up. Not a single dick to be seen." Jeff says, wetting her lips after saying Dick. You don't even think she notices she did that. "It looks like you adapted fast." she says, looking at all the make up on you.
"Oh, right. I forgot I was wearing any...I mean I didn't put it on...someone else put it on me...when I was asleep." you say.
"Look, I don't care. We have more important things going on right now." says Jeff as she leaves.

You go back to the bathroom and was the stuff off your face. The nail polish doesn't seem to be coming off as easily.
Before you can try scraping it off, the door knocks again.
As you open it, you get a first to the gut and fall down on the floor as an athletic looking girl jumps on you.
"I know this is your fault somehow." she yells, pinning you down. "Fix it! Fix it!"
"Tom?" you ask.
Tom raises her fist, like she's going to punch you in the face. She then opens the fist and slaps you on the cheek. Tom rolls on his back beside you and starts crying.
"Are you alright?" you ask.
"Why am I crying? I'm not even sad. I'm angry." Tom blubbers.
