You don't really get a response. Before you know it, you're at this guys place, undressing.
In the background, you can hear that stranger from the bathroom laugh at you.

This is hell, you can still think like yourself, but your body doesn't respond to any mental commands. It seems driven by lust. At least your hell has pleasurable sensations, which you immediately learn to hate.
"I need you in me so badly." your body says to the stranger.
"I need to vomit." you think.

Meanwhile, across the campus, Samantha is talking to her father.
",,,And that's how I got back at the guy for calling you a man." he says.
"You turned her into a what?!" Sam shouts.

Turns out Sam is pretty petty and decides that you got what was coming to you and doesn't care that you stay that way.
"It's what he gets for being prettier than me." she thinks to herself, and that's the last she ever thinks of you.
1211111111111111111111111112111121211122.title: A woman of questionable intent

121111111111111111111111111211112122.content:
It's a stranger. You're too ugly to be followed, by a stalker. You're too new at being feminine (looking) to even has a stalker notice you. So you think there is something very strange about what is going on.

You start to walk a bit slower and let the guy catch up to you. It's populated enough that there is very little chance he can attack you. There are enough guys out that you can just yell 'rape' and get the guy beat up.

"Hello sir." the guy says.
You're impressed that the guy recognizes that you're man. "What do you want?" you ask him.
"I just want to help you." says the man.
"Help me with what?" you ask.
"With your current condition. I know about your slow metamorphose." he says.
"I don't know what you're talking about." you say.
"Do not lie to me sir. Or I will leave you without aid." says the man as a blue aura begins to surround him.
"I don't understand." you say.
"I want to help you lift your curse. But only if you'll help me." he says.
"Help you how?" you ask.
"The one who made the curse, I want him." he says.
"The girl who kissed me...er, I guess he's a guy now. You want him/her?"
"That was but a victim. I want the one who started this curse. An old, forgotten, perverted god. He is coming for you."
"What do I need to do?" you ask.
"Let him take you." he says.
"Is that it?" you ask.
"No." he says as he shoots a blue jolt at you.
"What was that?!" you ask.

Cramps fill your body, and clenching your stomach, you fall towards the ground.
The man looks at you in horror.
"There is a glitch!" he says as he disappears.
"Glitch? What glitch?" you think as you roll in pain on the ground.
121111111111111111111111111211112122.title: It's a Stranger

1211111111111111111111111112111121221.content:
You lay on the ground until Jeff, a guy who lives down the hall from you and Tom stops and looks at you.
"Are you okay, miss?" he asks.
You daintily reach out a limped hand for him to take, as he gently lifts you up.
"I am now." you say as you look into his eyes.
"Wow." he says, you can tell her thinks your hands feel like silk.
"I'm glad you're okay." he says as he pushes golden hair to the side of your face and behind your ear. You meekly smile. You're hair isn't blond but gold. It wasn't like that when you woke up today. (Or any other time in your life.)
You look down and see your chest is a size bigger than it was when you got up. And you feel a clear emptiness between your legs. As you get up, you feel weak in the knees, and tremble a bit. You are about to tip over when Jeff catches you.
"Careful. I got you." he says, and you both blush. His touch is so comforting.
You can see it in his eyes. Jeff thinks your the perfect woman for him. You mind is starting to think that Jeff might be the perfect man for you. You start to envision marrying him and raising his children. It feels so right.

What did that stranger do to you.

"Um...Can I have your number?" you say.
"Oh, ya. Sure. Absolutely." Jeff says and he takes out a piece of scrap paper and starts writing his phone number down.
"I'm free tomorrow for dinner." he says.
"Okay." you say meekly.

You both lean in towards each other, but decide to hold off kissing until a the date.

You start to walk towards the washroom.

You walk into the ladies washroom without even thinking about it and stare in front of a mirror. You're not wearing a gown, but otherwise, you look like a fairytale princess.

"What's going on?" you say to your reflection.
"Your in love." your reflection responds. Suddenly, your heart opens up and you feel like singing to the animals.
1211111111111111111111111112111121221.title: Find out the glitch

12111111111111111111111111121111212211.content:
This urge to sing overwhelms you. Fling open the washroom doors and let out a sharp musical note. The rest of the people in the building stare at you in disbelief.

The next six minutes are a blur. You vaguely recall improvising some sort of song as the birds flew onto the window ledge and backed up your verses. You also thing that one or two people came in while you did the second chorus verse. To anyone else it would have been humiliating. (Maybe that's why your mind blocked it out.)

Not sure what happened, you stay silent for half a minute, and the people around you burst into applause. You do a mock curtsy and leave towards the street. That was strange.

You skip towards the road and breath in whatever nature lies around the university roadways. Before you can really take in what's happening, a pearly white motorcycle pulls over towards you, and the rider takes off his helmet.

It's Jeff!

"That took some balls." Jeff said.
"Thanks." you say sheepishly."
"How come I never saw you before?" Jeff asks.
"I was waiting for the right audience to perform for." you reply. (Was that an improvised lie, or is something else going on?)
"How do you feel about a performance for one?" asks Jeff obviously flirting.
"I don't do private performances. I don't do private performances." you think.
"I love them. Although you'd be my first." you say.
Jeff blushes.
"Well then little lady. Hop on and we'll make some sweet music together." he says.
"No. No. NO!" you think as you hop on the back seat of the motorcycle, also known as the bitch seat.

Together you both ride away to start your knew life.
"What the hell is happening?" your male brain says to itself.
"Shh, don't question my fairytale." comes a feminine response.
12111111111111111111111111121111212211.title: Fairytale Ending?

12111111111111111111111111121111212212.content:
Suddenly, another girl comes in through the door, and your reflection changes again. Your hair is shorter and black. "What's going on?" you think in horror.
"I'm sorry. I didn't know this room was occupied." says the girl.
"Oh, I was just leaving." you say as you go outside. Even though you had no plans on leaving that mirror a second ago.
You walk out through the building until you bump into a science nerd.
"Excuse me. I didn't mean to bump into you." he says.
"Sorry, it's my fault, I was walking so fast, it was like I was going warp three." you say.
(Wait, did you actually just say that? Not even hardcore Trekkies talk like that!)
"Wait, you watch Star Trek?" the guy asks.
"Um ya, all higher life forms do." you laugh with a snort.
"So you've seen all the movies too." he asks.
"And the cartoon series. People who tell you that's not cannon..."
"Are crazy." you finish together.
"Wow, I didn't think anyone watched the cartoon show." the guy says with a smile.
"Maybe we could get together and discuss it sometime." you say.
"Ya, I'd defiantly like that."

The guy gives you his number and walks away. You look at your reflection in the glass. You're face is pale, and you hair is done up into a ponytail.
As the the hall becomes empty, you see that you revert back to the way to looked two nights ago as a woman. "How did I know that guy liked Star Trek?" you think.
12111111111111111111111111121111212212.title: you change again

121111111111111111111111111211112122121.content:
Before you start to wander aimlessly some more, the stranger who you met earlier today appears in front of you.
"What did you do to me?" you ask.
"I made an error. I meant to make your curse transferable, but instead have made it unstable."
"I see." you say as a blue aura starts to glow around you.
"You are adopting traits from those around you, and morphing to fit their idealistic description of a companion." he says.
"That makes sense." you say.
"You are becoming their idea of a perfect girl." says the guy.
"And how does this help you?" you ask.
"It does not. If anything, it may hinder my plans." he says.
"Does this mean you'll have to kill me to take me out of the equation?"
"Nothing so drastic. I just need to retrieve my power from you."
"And that will make you safe?" you ask in a concerned tone.
"It will stabilize your curse. Midnight tomorrow, you'll be who you are to become." he says as he disappears.
"Thank you." you say.

The glow around you fades and you start walking again.
121111111111111111111111111211112122121.title: Another transforming encounter awaits

1211111111111111111111111112111121221211.content:
You feel your skin start to shift again, and you look up to see Amy looking at you. You get a look at her, and she turns her head, embarrassed.
You look down at your shifting breast size, they're getting smaller. You look up again to see Amy looking at you.
"Are you okay?" she asks.
"I'm fine." you grunt.
"Oh, good. Because you look in pain." she says.
"Womanly issues." you grunt again.
"Oh." says Amy. "I guess you want to be alone then."
"Please don't leave me." you tell her. You can see in her eyes, that that's exactly what she wants to hear.
"You look familiar?" she says.
"I do?" you ask.
"Yes, but I can't quite put my finger on it."
You stand up again, you're about an inch shorter than Amy, but Amy in in heels.
"I'm Amy." she says, putting her hand out to be shaken.
"I'm Alex." you instinctively say.
"My roommate is dating an Alex." Amy says.
"Small world."
"You kind of look like him." she says.
"Him? You're saying I look like a man?" you say in a panicked voice. (Stupid curse.)
"What, no! You just look like his twin sister. It's kind of eerie, the more I look at you, the similar you seem to me."
"Creepy."
"I guess. I just think you have a similar face. I didn't mean to imply that you looked like a guy. You're way to pretty for that." she says.
"Thanks, but I do look like a guy." you say. (Shut up curse!)
"You really think so?" she asks.
"Ya, but I tried getting all dolled up before. I'm no good at it." you tell her.
"Don't your friends help you out?" she asks.
"All my friends are guys. Most of them don't think of me as a chick."
"Oh, that's your problem! I don't have any classes tomorrow. You want to meet me in the cafeteria? I'll show you how to get noticed." Amy smiles.
"Um, sure I guess." you say. (Why won't think curse let you shut up?)
"Great, meet me tomorrow at lunch, bring some money." she says.
"Kay." you say as you separate.
As she leaves, you can feel the skin revert to how it was before you ran into Amy.
"Great." you think. "Tomorrow, I got two dates and a makeover scheduled."
The thought of this sends shivers up your spine. But by midnight tonight, you are stuck as whoever you're with wants you to be like. And you'll probably be trapped that way for the rest of your life.
1211111111111111111111111112111121221211.title: Run into Amy

1211111111111111111111111112111121221211.content:
There was no good way out of this situation. That stranger that did this too you really messed up. For the remainder of the day, you shifted until whatever the person near you wanted their mate to be. It wasn't so bad until you tried to walk through a crowd and the constant shifting made you drop dead from exhaustion.

The guy who tried to resuscitate you told paramedics that you were the most beautiful girl he's ever seen. Tests done found that you had no drugs in your system, but a staggering amount of estrogen. By the end, absolutely no one was able to recognize you, and you were buried in a grave marked Jane Smith.

If you were still able to think, you'd probably realize it was better this way, as if you'd have made it to midnight, anything that resembled your old self would probably have been dead anyways.
1211111111111111111111111112111121221211.title: Epilogue (Already?)

choices: Make it back to your apartment
1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.content:
As you approach a guy from behind, you notice that you're changing once again. You look into the mirror and see that you're another foot smaller, and looks like a very stereotypical Chinese girl.
The guy in front of you is feeling that there is something in the air, and turns around to see you slightly hop back in surprise.
This guy is Tom.

"Hey." he says. "Are you following me."
"No...I mean...no. I'm just walking to my next class." you say, trying to avoid making eye contact.
"Oh. I'm sorry. You just seem familiar. Somehow."
"Maybe we met in a past life." you murmur to him.
"Maybe. Or maybe I was meant to find you." he says. You're noticeably blushing. The alterations to the curse must be affecting both of you.
"This seems really sudden, I don't even know your name, but I want to get to know you better." he says.
"Um...there's really not much to know." you tell him.
"Hey, I insist. Sometime tomorrow, you and me are getting some dinner." he says.
"Um, sure." you say, as you notice your knees are bent and rubbing together.
"Great." says Tom.

Tom gives you his new information. As he walks away, you slowly revery back to yourself, well, your female self.
"This is so humiliating." you think. "I need to get myself away from people."
1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.title: Run into Tom

1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.content:
Unfortunately, before you can find a safe place to be, you run across Tyler. Before today, you never personally met Tyler, but you recall reading an article in the campus paper about him, and hoe he has a reputation as a huge pervert. Before he even looks at you, you feel your body begin to morph, as your mass rearranges itself.

"Damn. Come here baby." he says the second he sees you. His eyes tell you that he expects you to walk away, but you do the opposite as you swagger up to him.
"What is it?" you say with puckered lips and a sultry voice.
"Damn!" says Taylor as you walk right up next to him.
He slaps you ass.
"Is that the best you can do?" you say as you direct his hand onto your breast.
Tyler starts to mumble something, but instead just creams his pants. You notice.
"Too excited? Why don't we find an empty room, and I'll clean that up for you." you say as you moisten your lips.
"Okay." Tyler gulps, thinking that this is some sort of set up.

You really don't want to know what happens next. As a small part of your old self is constantly screaming and trying to look away in horror, but it can't. It feels, sees and hears everything you do, and is completely broken by the experience. Worst part is that after this whole thing, you beg Tyler to lock you in his basement, where you stay until the curse hardens and you are stuck like this.
1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.title: Meet Tyler

1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.content:
You look in the mirror and see that you look like the female version of yourself again. You can't believe it. You just accepted invitations to hang with three different men. And at the time, you were more than eager to do it. On top of that, the constant transformations are leaving you feeling drained of energy. At least you are safe for the time being in your room. Unless Tom comes in. You put a sock on the door handle and hope that that lets him know to stay out.

You need to do something soon. This glitch in the curse is making you a slave to whoever you're with. It's only a matter of time before you run into some pervert who only sees you as a sex object. You need to do something and do it now. Then it hits you, the stranger said that you'd become the person's ideal companion. So if you're with a woman who loved you for who you were, it may cause the curse to change you back. You only ran into one girl since the new phase of your curse started, and maybe she was a lesbian, so if you can find Emily, maybe there is hope!

You know Emily checks her email very frequently, so you pop off an email to meet her around four, in an abandoned trail in the trees around the school. You went for a walk there once, she knows it, but no one goes there at this time of year. You'll be safe until she shows.

Two hours pass, you dress warmly, and then you race off across campus, feeling your body change with every person you pass. Thankfully, you're not by anyone long enough for the curse to take really transform you. Eventually, you reach the forest, where you hide yourself just off of the path. Sitting on a log and waiting for Emily to come.

As you wait, you look up and see that it is a lot darker than you are used to it being at this time of year.

Silently, you wait until you see a figure coming around the corner.
1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.title: Make it back to your apartment

1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.content:
"Emily?" you say in a muffled voice, as you stand up in your windbreaker.
"Alex, is that you?" she asks.
As she gets closer, you can feel your body change, you're beginning to change size.
"It's me." you say, but your voice cracks.
"Why did you want me meet?" she asks.
"Because I need to be with you." you say.
"I don't understand." she says.
"I'm going through some changes right now." you say.
"Okay?" she says as she slowly gets closer.
You can feel that you've stopped shifting, but something seems wrong. At first you think you're taller than her, but then you realize that you're standing on the log.
"Alex, are you wearing a wig?" asks Emily.
You look down, your hair is to your elbows. Your breasts are bigger than before, and your skin is the smoothest it has ever been.
"No." you say in a squeaky voice.
Emily gets closer still.
"Are you wearing fake breasts?" she says.
"Of course not." you say.
"Because I'm not sure what is going on here." she says.
Thoughts start to flow through your head, you want to make her dinners, hold a frilly umbrella as you walk through the park with her. Wear nice dresses in the sun as you drink lemonade.
The glitch mast have worked differently than you thought.
"What's going on with you?" she asks.
"Tell me I look pretty." you say.
"What?" she says with a playful smile, thinking some sort of punchline is coming.
"I need you to tell me a look pretty." you say.
"You look pretty." she says in a deadpan voice.
"Thank you." you say as you step down towards her.
"Alex, I'm confused. What is going on?" she asks.
"Something happened." you say as you unzip the windbreaker and reveal the bulges in your chest.
"Jesus, Alex! Those are bigger than mine." she says.
"Well, I think you might have something to do with that." you say.

The next hour consists of you telling her everything that has happened this week and explaining to her what happened earlier today.
"...so you see why I need to stick around you." you tell her as you finish.
"I see." she says, trying hard to take this all in. She looks like she thinks she's still in a dream.
"Alex. I have a confession to make." she says.
"Yes?" you say, and you move a bit closer to her.
"Over the last few nights, I had a recurring dream that you were a woman."
"Creepy."
"I know.--I was still me, but you were kind of girly. We didn't have physical relations, but we went to restaurants, and walks in the park, and it was a nice change of pace. You'd try on dresses with me, we'd go to the clubs, and we became closer."
"And now your dreams have come true." you try and finish the thought for her.
"It's weird, but I felt like I was acting as a man in the relationship. I wanted to give it a try, just this once." she says.
There is a moment of silence, neither of you speaks. Then Emily lets out a sigh.
"Now that this has actually happened, it's just wrong." she says. "I'd be taking advantage of you."
"And the fact that you feel that way, makes me love you even more." you tell her.
"But Alex, I don't know if you mean that, or if its the curse talking. You're not a whole person!"
"Because I'm female?"
"Because you don't have a choice!"
"Do you want me to have a choice?" you ask her.
"Alex?"
"What?"
"You're not changing as quickly. What I want you to say, and what you're saying are changing. Ten minutes ago, we were in synch, now I've moved on, and you're not moving as fast.
"The curse might be stabilizing." you tell her. "I can still feel myself change, but it's getting slower."
"And you are around me?" she asks.
"Yes." you tell her. "Is that a big deal?"
She kisses you. "It's a big deal. Come on, we're going to my place." she says.

You arrive at her place, and she takes you into her bedroom.
"What are you doing?" you ask.
"I'm experimenting." she says.
"What are you going to do?"
Emily strips in front of you. "Role play!" she says. "I'll be the princess, you'll be the prince.
"Okay." you say nervously.
"Speak in a lower voice." she tells you.
"Okay, princess." you say again.

The actions that happen yet go on for hours until you both fall asleep from exhaustion.
1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.title: Emily's reveal

1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.content:
You wake up with your arm around Emily. Your noticeably hairy arm around her. Your muscular (well, for you anyway,) arm over her as she leans against you. You are both naked, and you can feel her breasts push against your chest. Your male chest.
You feel the tip of your Johnson push against her leg. You take a quick look under the bed and notice that it is two inches larger than before. You have noticeably less hair now too.
"Good morning, my prince." says Emily with a half opened eyes and a full smile.
"My princess." you say as you start kissing her shoulder.
"Would you mind making us some breakfast?" she says.
"Of course you say." As you get up and walk naked to get her some cereal.

Amy walks into the kitchen well you are there and you're both in shock. She's surprised to see you naked, and you're expecting to once again change.
Nothing happens.
"Is that you Alex?" she says.
"Yes, why do you ask, lady?"
"You're just like a foot taller, and more built. Your jaw even looks more chiseled."
"I see." you say. You can't help but notice Emily is staring at your crotch the entire time.
"After breakfast, I shall put on some pants if you so desire." you say.
"I don't mind." says Amy.

You walk back into the bedroom naked. "Would the mademoiselle find it to her liking if I were to clean her apartment after partaking in digesting these morning refreshments?" you say.
"Would I?" says Emily, excited.

So, this is now who you are for the rest of your life. It could have gone down so much worse, but in the back of your mind, you realize that you'll never be you again. Of course in the journey of your life, who is really the same person they started out as? Being Emily's boy-toy is a much better fate for you than being some guys' girlfriend. Turns out it's cheaper too.
1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.title: You wake up

1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.content:
You wake up on the couch. What are you doing out here? You think about it and remember Emily suddenly getting sick last night. You look down and realize that you're still female. "It didn't work." you think.
You get up and walk over to the bathroom. Where you sit down and release your bladder.
Getting up, you look in the mirror and pinch yourself. You're skin looks better with that reddish colour. You look down and see some blush on the side of the counter. "No. No. Not that." you think as you walk out of the bathroom, after you wash your hands.
You look down and see that you're not wearing any pants. "Maybe a skirt would help." you think.
You look back at the couch and realize that it's closer to Amy's room.
Then it hits you, you were where sleeping closer to Amy than Emily, the curse started altering you to make you more like someone that Amy would want to hang out with.

Crap, despite being a strong feminist, Amy is really into fashion and boys, and now you're into that too. Despite having no previous knowledge in what to do with those subjects, you want to start revolving your life around those things. (All while being true to your feminine integrity.)

Emily walks out of her room, and looks at you with raccoon eyes. "Are you up?" she says.
"Of course." you say, pushing your hair behind your ear.
"Are you okay?" she asks.
"I think I need to get dressed. Can I borrow some of your clean clothes?" you ask.
In that moment you can see it in Emily's eyes. She's lost you.
1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.title: That was wierd

choices: And find enough willpower to stop yourself
1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.content:
You expect to see Emily walking towards you, but instead you see a man. Who seems impossibly covered in shadows. He looks like the guy that tried to help you earlier, but you can tell it's not. There is something off about him. He's taller, darker and more mysterious. (Why is your heart fluttering?)

As he walks closer, you can feel your body alter itself. As you peer down, a darkness seems to cover you. There is a burning sensation beneath your skin. But it is a good burn. Your mind starts to go empty as the stranger walks near.

"My, my, what have we here?" he asks.
You stay silent. You can't feel yourself, moving, but you see that you are now standing to face him.
"Ah, yes, the silent type. My favorite type. How do I not know you?" he asks.
"Me..." you say, not really being able to start or finish the sentence.
The stranger seems to swoop to where you are standing and examine you. You are as a statue.
"I say, I see, you are a wonder." he says as he looks at your ass.
"You..." you try and speak, but are unable to say more than a word.
"I think we are soul mates." says the stranger.
You say nothing, and the stranger takes a giant whiff out of your hair.
"Tell me, how wicked are you?" says the stranger.
You close your eyes. This is the stranger that the one you met earlier today, wanted you to deal with.
"I asked you how wicked you are to be." he says. "Answer me."
"Wick--ed...enou..." you manage to let out. There is something stopping you, you can feel two powers at work here. One is the curse, the other seems to be coming from the stranger.
"Wicked, enough, but not bright enough to form a sentence or even a coherent thought." the dark stranger says as he looks in your eyes. "The perfect woman."
"Take my hand." the stranger says.
You can feel the powers start to conflict within you. Maybe, just maybe, you can gather enough energy to resist this guy. The stranger sees the hesitation in your eyes.
"Take my hand." he says in an annoyed tone.

You reach out your hand to take his...
1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.title: It is another stranger

"No." you say as you pull your hand away.

"I don't want to...I want to leave." you say, as the burning feeling inside you intensifies.
"Do not talk to me that way, woman." says the stranger as he gives you an intense stare.
That stare did it. You can feel your mind being torn apart by the pain and his powers.
"Stop struggling now, and you may keep whatever part of your mind is left." he says.
"Unng." you cry out, with some unintelligible word.
You can feel the stranger giving you a less intense stare.
"Kluurg" you say.
"Oh dear, I think I broke you." says the stranger in a patronizing voice.

You don't have much memory, you don't know how to use your own body, but your brain tells you that it likes you having physical contact.
"Klurff." you say lovingly.
"We'll make you better." says the stranger.
Next think you know, you're covered in shadows, and the whole world looks black.

When you get your sight back, it's two years later and you're in a dark cabin room. You're holding a baby that is suckling on your breast. It's a little girl, and it looks just like you.
"Furgth." you say, as you rock it in a loving manner.
1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.title: And find enough willpower to stop yourself

1211111111111111111111111112111121221212.content:
As your fingers touch, you feel a slight levitation as your feet leave the ground. You are literally walking on air, as that burning sensation in you is intensifying.
"Come, come with me." says the stranger in a dark voice, his face morphing to look less than human at the moment. Very demonic.
"Yes." you say in a meek tone.
You begin to talk further and further, into the air, when suddenly you feel yourself shift again. Your fingers slip and you fall a foot to the ground.
"What happened?" you say.
"Are you alright?" comes a voice behind you.
"Ouch." you say.
The stranger drops down too and looks more human again.
"Are you alright?" asks the voice again.
You look behind and see Emily. She arrived. (Finally.)
"I'm okay." you say, as you slowly get up.
"I'm sorry." she says, seeing the two of you. "I was supposed to meet someone here."
You're shifting again, still female, but you feel more familiar than you did when it was just you and the stranger.
"Am I interrupting something?" she asks.

The dark stranger looks up at her.

"Another female. How dare you speak to me." he says in a calm but hissing voice.

Not wanting to look at anymore of Alan's scrap-booking, for the moment, you keep looking through his desk. You find some ripped out pages from other books. Almost none of them have any notes. Although you find a highlighted passage on one of the pages. It says: When dealing with contagious monsters as werewolves or vampires, whose bite may cause the curse to spread to the victim, it is possible to undo the curse in the victim, by killing the monster that infected them in some ritual manner.

It hit's you, this must have been what Alan was trying to do for you. Unable to cure himself, he's hoping that his death will cure you.

There's really nothing to note until you flip over the page and find a tiny sentence in the back. It says: In some legends involving werewolves and vampires, the only way to revert the curse is for the most recent victim of the creature to be the one to kill it.

Then it hits you, that part is not highlighted, Alan probably never read it. (Oh shit.)

Overall, it's not how you imagined your life to go, but you're making the most of it, and it could have been a lot worse. At least you have the stamina to not kill yourself, or kiss random strangers at nighttime.

"Yes?" you say. (Why do you sound needy?)
"I'd like my coat back." he says.
For a second you consider telling him that he can take it with him in the morning. You have no clue why you'd think this, maybe it's so out of character that the thought just jumped in your head.

You laugh an embarrassing girlish laugh as you hand over the coat.
"Say something!" you think.
"It was nice meeting you." Todd says.
"Same." you say.
"So, if you see me around sometime, don't be afraid to come over and say hi." he says as he holds your hand.
"Okay." you say. You don't know why, but that physical contact has started your heart racing.
"I'll do the same." he says as he walks off into the night.

The door shuts and you walk up to your room. (Why do you feel like skipping? Stop it!)

You open the door, forgetting that you're female. It just hits you how embarrassing it'd be for you to walk in on Tom when you're like this.

"Enjoy your date?" asks a voice over at Tom's computer.
"Wait, what?" you ask as you flip on the light-switch.
The lights merely flicker and it hits you that the person at the computer isn't Tom.
121111111111121121111211.title: It gets stranger

1211111111111211211112111.content:
You look at the stranger, he looks an awful lot like what you thought Todd looked like at first glance. But Todd looked dorky, this guy doesn't even look human. Worst, what is this guy doing here? Where is Tom? Why won't the lights turn on? Immediately, your instincts are telling you to go. But as you try to open the door, it seems locked. (When did you even close the door?)

The stranger stands up, he's taller than you though, shadows cover him as he walks towards you.
"You like Todd." he says.
"Who...I..." so many questions and comments and responses are flooding in your head that you can't even decide on one.
"Shhhh." he hisses, demanding silence. "I don't care about your response. You are shocked, but find that you can no longer speak.
The stranger seems to hover over to you as he takes a close examination of your face. Some mystical force is keeping you still as a statue as his fingers go over your face, examining you like a doctor might.
"Todd will like you." he says.
"Who are you? What's your relationship with Todd?" you try and ask. All that comes out is a muffled sound.
The dark stranger laughs. "So cute before you're broken." he says.

The stranger in front of you slaps you on the ass, just to show that he can. You want to yell, but you're still somewhat frozen. You'd let out a little yelp, except that there is no sound emulating from your vocal cords, and your mouth is now open in an odd position.

"You're probably wondering about Todd, and what I have to do with him. It's simple, nice guy, helped me out, wanted a woman, gave him you."
"You can't do this!" you manage to finally say. You wanted to yell, but it came out as a struggle to speak.
"I can and I have." says the stranger with a grin.
"I won't let this happen." you say.
"You don't have a choice." the stranger says triumphantly.
"I..." you want to finish that thought but can't. For a second you mind feels like a blank slate.
"Do you even remember why you were outside when I found you?" asks the stranger.
"Emily!" you think.

The stranger laughs and disappears.
1211111111111211211112111.title: Who is this strange man?

12111111111112112111121111.content:
As the dark stranger vanishes, his power over you seems to be diminished, you can move again!
Quickly, your memories race back and you realize that you were after Emily again. You look down, you are in your dress clothes, that now fit very loosely on you. (A bit tight in the chest though.) You slip into something more comfortable and throw on a light coat.

The night is cold as you go out into it, you can see the heat from your breath float in the air. The coat helps a bit, but it seems a lot heavier now that it did when you last wore it. You think about the direction that Emily was walking in and realize that almost no place it open right now. She's probably at the campus bar. Slowly, you walk towards the location.

You can't believe how cold it is out, but for some reason your stomach is warm, you can be grateful for that at least.
You walk into the bar, looking at a pair of women standing outside having a smoke, one in in nylons, the other is showing off her legs, both are wearing mini-skirts. "How are they not freezing?" you think.

You walk into the bar, your hands feeling cramped. You walk by a mirror behind the bar and almost jump at your reflection, your face looks so feminine. Your skin looks a bit brighter, your cheeks are red and even your lips look plumper than usual. Is cold weather doing this to you?

You quickly scan the bar when you see Emily on a stool, flirting with a guy.

You can't have that, despite you present condition, Emily is still your girlfriend.
12111111111112112111121111.title: Better do something

121111111111121121111211111.content:
If you were thinking, you'd realize that Emily just wanted the attention of a man. You're currently a chromosome off to fit that requirement, and it'll probably be a bad idea to go up to her in a bar, possibly looking more attractive than she is. But right now you're clearly not thinking like yourself, you're being driven emotionally. (Way to live up to the stereotype.)

"Excuse me!" you say walking up to Emily and grabbing her arm.
Emily looks scared for a second, then it kicks in who you are, and her expression turns to anger.
"Go away, I want to be alone." she says.
"Really, because it looks here like you don't." you say, your eyes pointing towards the man on the other side of her.

"Am I interrupting anything?" the man asks.
"No Dale, it's fine." she says.
"No it's not. We need to talk about some things." you say.
"I...Look, I'll be over there when you two ladies are done with whatever." Dale says, pointing to an empty table.

"Look, I know our relationship is going through a phase..."
"A phase? A phase?! Did you look in the mirror? You look more girlie than me! You can't satisfy me, and I don't think I can deal with having a were-bitch for a boyfriend. I need stability, and you can't give me stability at the moment."
"So what do you want me to do?" you ask.
"I want you to give me space." she says.
"I want you to help me through this!" you protest.

There is a moment of silence.

"Do you trust me?" she asks.
"I...yes." you say.
"Then give me some space for a while."

"Fine." you say as you walk away from your table. You should have never left her apartment tonight.

You are about to leave the bar when a voice comes from behind you. "Hey." it says.

You turn around to see Todd.
"Oh, hey Todd." you say.
"What are you doing out here tonight?"
"I could ask you the same thing." you instinctively retort.
"Well, earlier tonight I was helping a beautiful woman make it back to her place safely in the dark, and thought I'd reward myself for my actions with a quick drink."
"Oh." you say.
"What were you doing here?" he asks again.
You point towards Emily, who is now sitting beside Dale at the table. "I came here to help a friend. She's going through some changes in her life."
"You must be a good girlfriend to her then."
"The best." you say sighing as Emily clearly is letting Dale's arm go around her.
Emily gives you a quick stare.
"I think she wants us to leave." Todd says.
"I guess so." you say.
"So where will you be off to next?" he asks.
"I don't know, I was thinking I could walk you home."

(Wait! WHY DID YOU SAY THAT?!)
121111111111121121111211111.title: Go up and confront her

1211111111111211211112111111.content:
"I'd like that." says Todd, and it seems your fate is set.

As you walk back, Todd seems rather quiet, but he's giving off some great body heat, so you find yourself sticking closer to him than you mean to.
"Todd, you seem like a good guy." you say.
"I'm just trying to do what's right." he says as you feel his hand brush against yours. And your not pulling your hand away.
"I have a question, and you don't have to answer it if you don't want to, okay?"
"Sure, ask way." he says.
"Are you only nice to women, or do you help guys who are in danger too?"
"I help everybody." Todd says.
"Like, you do brave things, or are just a nice guy?" you ask. Your mind is thinking harder now, you can't seem to refuse this guy, you can feel something trying to force you to be attracted to him, but you can feel something inside of you trying to talk your way out.

"Okay, I'll tell you a story, but you have to keep it between you and me...this morning I saw three guys beating on someone in an alleyway. I didn't know the situation, but I'm convinced that if I didn't step in, the person being beaten would die. So I threw some rocks, and told them I called the police. The guys ran away. I ran up to the beaten guy and looked at his wounds. Offered him a chance to go to the hospital, but within five minutes, he stood right up and looked fine.
"Did he offer you a reward?"
"Helping others is reward enough for me."
"You didn't answer my question."

Todd looks at you, pondering on if he should say something.
"It's okay if you don't want to tell me." you say. (You don't know if that was you talking, or this curse.)
"It's funny. I asked the guy if he could introduce me to someone I'd like. The guy accepted and disappeared."
"And you ran into me tonight." you say smiling as you wrap around his arm. (You hadn't noticed earlier, but you were holding his hand for the last few minutes.)

"Well, here is my building." Todd says as he looks up as his residence. "Do you want to come to my room and get warmed up.
You want to scream no, but only one answer leaves your lips:
1211111111111211211112111111.title: A cold little stroll

12111111111112112111121111111.content:
As you enter Todd's room, you realize that he is a gentleman. He takes off your coat, and doesn't mention anything about your loose fitting clothing. He even cooks up some herbal tea for you. He's so thoughtful. You don't even mind that he's got a book about computer coding next to his bed, or action figures on his small bookshelf. After a pleasant but brief conversation, Todd leans over.

"There is something that I wanted to do since I met you." he says.
"What is that?" you ask, your heart pounding, you don't know if you'll like the answer.
Todd's answer in not a verbal but a physical one and he plants his lips to yours and sneaks his tongue between them. Wow! You were sure Todd would be meeker than this. And judging by his technique, he's done this before.

A moment later the kiss stops and you are on your back horrified. What has this curse done to you? It seems that the more extreme your emotions are, the more your brain thinks like a guys. Then it hits you, you've just infected Todd with the same curse that you've been carrying. Todd doesn't act any different, but then again, the effects on you weren't noticeable right away.

You look up and Todd is kneeling over you, taking off his shirt. (Which is not a pretty sight.)
"Wait, Todd, stop." you say.
Todd stops in the middle of taking his shirt off, and pulls his head through the neck hole. "What?"
"Todd, do you want these?" you say pointing to your breasts."
Todd stays silent before replying, "Is this a trick question?"
"Do you want this and this?" you say pointing to your vagina and your brain.
"Ya, I guess so." Todd says.

Then listen Todd, I have something to tell you..."
12111111111112112111121111111.title: You are in his room!

choices: This is stupid, you should go watch some TV
121111112.content:
You get up to follow the girl and give her a piece of your mind. She could have really complicated your life is Emily ever found out about it, not to mention that she wasn't even that great of a kisser. If anyone saw you making out with her, they'd probably think that you've lowered your standards.

Unfortunately, as you get up to chew her out, you find that she has disappeared in the library. An anger overwhelms you and you struggle hard to stop from making an outburst and doing something foolish you yourself. You sit back down but find your mind is too emotional to concentrate on work. You pretend to read a book, while you secretly watch other people walk by you as they sit down to study.

After an hour of sitting there and getting no work done, you mind thinks...
121111112.title: Failing at your tasks

12111112.content:
"YOU!" you shout, as some other students in the library look at you.
"Sshh! Don't bring attention to us." says the girl.
"I don't care. I don't appreciate people playing games with me."
"You don't like girls kissing you?" she says in a babyish voice.
"I don't like strangers kissing me. Especially if they're you!"
"Don't worry about that, I have a feeling you won't get strange girls kissing you much longer."
"Bitch!" you say.
"I have my reasons." Alice says with a smirk.
"Leave!" you tell her.
"Just leave!"
"If you want to talk some more, I'll let you touch my boob." she says.
As she says this, a guy looks at your direction. It's Jeff, a student that lives down the hall from you. Crap, he knows Emily.
"If you don't leave, I will." you say, hoping that Jeff won't think you're trying to cheat on Emily.
You grab your books, and pick them up.
"Fine, I was going to help you, but you're on your own." says the girl.
"Help me do what? Get herpes?" you say to her, hoping that your insult works.
"You know what, I didn't need to be here. But fine, be this way." she says as she stands up and leaves.
Jeff continues on his way as well.
What strange events, you have a sick feeling down in your stomach that this girl will make your life miserable.
12111112.title: Tell her off

121111121.content:
The day goes by pretty normally after that. The air is steadily getting colder, the other residence on campus seem relieved that it's the weekend. You find an old forgotten can of Tom's beer in the back of your fridge and figure that he won't miss it if you take a drink. You open the beer and finish it quickly. You look outside and notice that it's dark out. You're feeling kind of woozy, and the beer wasn't that strong. You feel your mind starting to go blank, and you throw yourself on the bed, ready to pass out.

That must be one hell of a beer.
121111121.title: Hours pass

1211111211.content:
You wake up with your head spinning. The roof above you seems to rock back and forth. Your mouth is wide open and dry. You lick your lips and try and swallow some saliva. (Tastes like cherry.) You try and sit up, expecting a hangover, but find that your adductor (inner thigh) muscles hurt more than anything else. You look down to see that your fly is undone and that you're not wearing any underwear. You stand up and carefully zip up your pants. Looking behind you, you see that you had spent the night on someones puke-green couch. On the floor around you, there are guys and girls still sleeping on the floor. Most people are in pairs, like couples. Bottles and glasses of beer little the house your in. You carefully move around people, making sure not to step on them. You then make your way out of the house.

That must have been some party. You don't remember a single thing about it. Once you reach the main street, you realize that you are only two blocks away from campus, and make your way back to the apartment. Thankfully, no one you meet along the way seems to know who you are. It's not until you reach your dorm room when something worth noting happens.

You open the door, and Tom is sitting on the side of his bed, putting on his shoes. "Have fun with Emily last night?" he asks.
"Um...how did you know?" you lie.
"I'm guessing that lipstick isn't yours." says Tom as you rub your finger on your lips and find that a reddish-pink substance comes off.
"I'm surprised she let you leave like that." Tom finishes.
"I left before she woke up." you lie.
"Going for boyfriend of the year?" jokes Tom.
"Something like that." you say as you head towards the bathroom.

Looking at your mirror, the lipstick is smudged from your lips onto the left side of your cheek. "What did I do last night?" you think as you wash it off. You unzip your pants to see if there are any marks or rashes on your penis. Did you have intercourse last night? (Did you use a condom?)
You then take a leak and are thankful that you're not in pain of having any burning sensations.

You hear Tom leave the bathroom as you decide what to do for the rest of today.
1211111211.title: Wake up

12111112111.content:
After taking a shower and dressing in some clean clothes, you decide that you should go and investigate what happened to you last night. Retracing your steps to the house that you woke up in, you walk down the street it's on and read the sign in front of the yard. Omega-Yang-Fraternity.

(Wonderful.)

You walk up the steps to the door, noticing that many of the cars that were there last night have now gone. Knocking on the door, you're greeted by an unshaven twenty-two year old with a beer gut.
"What?" he asks in an unhappy and gruff voice.
"I was wondering if I left any of my stuff here last night." you say to him, quickly improvising a reason to be there,
"You weren't here last night." he says.
"Sure I was, I think we just partied so hard that you forgot. I was the guy who fell asleep on the couch." you say.
"Impossible. It was just me and my fraternity brother's last night. And some bitches we picked up from the campus bar."
"I'm pretty sure I was there with you guys." you reply.
"You ain't listening to me. You weren't. We got film, we got pics, everyone in this house is going to star in my blog this afternoon. I just looked through the pics. You ain't in them." he sneers. "Now get outta here."
You see that that he is about to shut the door, so you shout, "If I wasn't there last night, how do I know that your couch is green?"

The guy looks at you with a suspicious face. He then shuts the door and leaves you alone on the porch.

There is nothing left to do now, but go back to campus. This whole thing was a waste of time.
12111112111.title: Returning to the scene of the awakening

choices: What the hell, let's do this.
121111121111.content:
Later that day, you decide to call Emily, but are unable to get her to answer your calls. Is she mad at you, or did she forget to turn on her cell phone again. After studying some more so that you can write your paper, you decide that going on the internet and randomly browsing websites would be more productive.

Typing Omega-Yang-Fraternity, you come across the blog that the guy you met was talking about. The pictures from last night are posted, and you slowly take your time scrolling through them. There are lots of pictures of hot girls doing inappropriate things. Some are flashing their breasts, some are dropping their pants, some are doing oral. (Hey, there's a video of the oral sex.)

After looking for an hour, finally catch something of interest, that mysterious girl that kissed you the other night is one of the ones with her top off. You then come across another picture of a girl who is naked, wearing only the lipstick that you woke up to find yourself marked with. You must have made out with her last night.

She doesn't look anything like a wholesome girl. You can tell by her face that this bitch is trouble. (Hopefully you wore a condom.) There is a picture of her making out with five different guys (while naked,) and your relieved when none of the pictures have her making out with you.

"What are you looking at?" Tom asks as he comes up behind you.
"Nothing." you say as you try and close the website.
You're not fast enough, Tom sees what's going on.
"Alex, if you wanted porn, I have collection in my closet." says Tom.
"No, it's a site that Amy found last night, she said one of her friend's were at this party." you lie.
"I thought you were with Emily last night."
"I was...they're always together." you explain.

(Wow, you're getting good at lying. It's like you don't even have to try.)

"Hey Alex, do you have any morning classes tomorrow?" Tom asks.
"Don't think so." you say.
"Couple of my friends got a private table at the Blue Club."
"Isn't that place full of..." you stop yourself before saying anything.
"It's got a few hot chicks in it. Plus we'll be drunk. Very drunk."
"This kind of sounds like it'll turn into a disaster." you tell him.
"Hey, you don't have to come, I'm just giving you the chance." said Tom.

"Maybe," you say, "but..."
121111121111.title: Online research

1211111211111.content:
You get dressed up a bit, you want to see if you can still impress the ladies, although now that you're with Emily, you'll do little more than dance with them.

You and Tom, and some of his athletic friends head towards the club, you can hear it thumping from the streets. It's already dark and you begin to feel a lightness in your head.
Tom looks at you. "Are you okay?" he asks.
"I'm fine, just a bit light headed." you tell him.
"And you didn't even have any drinks before we left." Tom says with a laugh as he slaps you on the back. "We'll get you something to eat once we're in the club."

You get into the club easily, it's not even ten yet, and it's a Sunday, there are no line ups. You find that the table reserved for you is at the corner of the club, next to the fire exit.

The music is thumping so hard that you can barely make out what that guys around you are saying. Tom buys you a sandwich, although it's dry and not that tasty. You down it with a beer from the mug that one of his other friends brought to the table.

There are poles on the dance floor on small platforms. 'PLEASE RESERVE POLES FOR WOMEN ONLY' says a sign. Three girls are dancing on it, but they're with their boyfriends, and almost no single woman (or group of them) have wandered into the bar.

"...Sausage fest." you hear one of Tom's friends say to him.

Then it happens again, You feel tired, and your sight starts to fade.
"Shit. I gotta go to the bathroom." you think as you cross the dance-floor towards the toilets.
You make it into the empty room, but find the place looks like a disaster zone. This place probably hasn't been cleaned in a week.
You lean over the toilet, careful not to touch anything and then completely black out.
1211111211111.title: What the hell, let's do this.

choices: Go talk to Emily, show her you still mean something to her
12111112111111.content:
You wake up with a hangover in your bed.
On the other side of the room, you can hear Tom snoring. Sitting up, you feel sore all over, like you had been working out for the past two days. (What's happening to you?)
You walk towards the bathroom, mirror, afraid of what you'll find. You're happy to see that there is no reminiscence of vomit on your face, or sign that you made out with any strange girls. You right side of your hair is a bit sticky though, probably from when you collapsed in the bathroom.

Tom lets out a loud snore again. Piecing this together in your head, you figure the most likely scenario is that you collapsed at the club, and Tom and his friends took you back to your place. (What a guy!)

It's Monday, so you don't have any classes until after lunch. You just make yourself a sandwich and see what's going on in the campus news blog.
It turns out that in the last two weeks, your campus has become known as being one of the more party driven schools in your area. For whatever reason, people from surrounding universities are starting to plan weekly pilgrimages to your area.

You finish your sandwich as Tom starts to wake up.

"Hey Tom." you say.
"Ung...what?" says Tom still drowsy from his sleep.
"Hope I didn't ruin your night out." you say.
"What happened to you Alex? You disappeared on us." Tom says, squeezing his eyes as he blinks.
"I uh...what?"
"It's cool man, we just wondered where you went to. I was afraid you'd come back here, but I didn't see you last night."
"Wait? So no one took me out of the club?"
"I didn't, and I know my buddies didn't either."
"Did you guys even try to see if I was okay?"
"Dude, in all honesty, we got kind of distracted."
"Kind of distracted?"
"After you left, a hot girl came in. Started swaying on those poles like it was no ones business. Afterwords, one of the guys bought her a drink, and she did a lap dance right in front of us."
"What a whore." you say.
"I know right, but that's not even the weird part."
"It gets worse?"
"After she starts to flirt with us, five more ladies start coming in and dancing at with everyone in the bar. The girl that's with us keeps giving them ice cold stares. Keeping them away from out table, like she's got her claim on us. Anyways, she can't keep all of us to herself, so Terry and Kyle go dancing with those other women. I swear, not two minutes later, I see them fondling the girls breasts in the corner."
"Wow, no wonder you didn't check up on me."
"I'm not even done the story. So the first girl, the one that's doing a lap dance on Corry. Starts sucking his fingers while looking at me."
"Wait...Corry is into finger sucking?"
"She was...Anyways, Corry is about to cream his jeans, and embarrassed, he runs to the bathroom. The woman crawls across the table, and says she wants to go back to my place."
"You didn't."
"I did. But it's not what you think. I get here, make sure you're not in the room, then jump on the bed. She looks at me like she wants to blow me. But first she offers to make a drink. I'm convinced she slipped something in that drink. I was out like a light."
"Damn, did she take your wallet?" you ask.
Tom checks his pants pocket. "Still here." he says.
"Did she rape you?"
Tom pulls the front of his pants forwards and looks down into them. "Doesn't smell funky." he smiles.
You think the conversation is over, but Tom looks up at you. "I've got to get together with the boys tonight to exchange war stories." he says.

You look at the time, You still got a good three hours before class.
12111112111111.title: Tom's story

121111121111111.content:
All this talk about hot girls reminds you that you have one of your own you should be paying attention to. Thankfully, there are no photos showing you doing anything crazy when you've blacked out, so at least those won't won't complicate your relationship.

You decide to surprise Emily, and go over to her residence bring her some unopened chocolates that you found hiding in the back of your kitchen shelf. You meant to give those to her a while back, you bought a few while they were on sale two months ago. Armed with the sweet aphrodisiacs, you know on the door, and Amy answers.

"Hi, Alex." she says with a smile.
"Hi Amy, if Emily here?" you ask.
Amy shakes her head. "Nope, you just missed her, she's going to some study group to look over some project."
"Oh, I brought these over for her." you say, holding out the chocolates. "I should probably come back and give these to her later." you say.
"I'll take them off your hands." Amy says, looking at the box with her hungry eyes.
"Thanks, I guess. Just make sure she gets them tonight. It's my apology for leaving her stranded the other day, when I got sick."
"I'll make sure she knows you were here." Amy says.

Amy shuts the door, leaving you a bit suspicious if the chocolates will last until Emily gets back. Amy's not fat, and she hasn't ever done anything to sabotage anything you do with Emily, so you figure you can trust her with the box. But her eyes did look really hungry, something seems off about her today.

You go back to your room, and get out the notes and assignments for the next class. The work was pretty easy, so you managed to finish it before this week started.

After the class, your day seems pretty boring. You eat some food, study the reading material, then participate in the next class. Once it gets dark out, you figure you'll just close your eyes for a bit before going back to study. You've been reading too much today, your eyes are burning. Surly a ten minute rest will be good for you.
121111121111111.title: Missed Again

1211111211111111.content:
You wake up on your bed, your limbs feeling sore. You must have slept funny. You must have also slept for a long time, when you look at the clock, it's almost noon! How did you get knocked out for so long. You've already missed your morning class, so you decide to take your time getting ready this morning. You look down and see that you're wearing the same clothes as you fell asleep in. You go to the mirror and find that you're hair isn't sticky, and no strange girls' lipstick rubbed off on you. You slept later than you thought, but this is the first night in a bit you feel like you've had an average sleep. You try and stretch your arms, but find that they are again sore.

You prepare to go to your next class early. It's the only one that you share with Emily. Emily's usually outside of it early, studying, or waiting to talk to you. You can't wait to see the look on her face. She probably thought that you were too busy to think of her, but those chocolates told a different story.

Your surprised at what a cold stare Emily gives you when you finally see her. (Did Amy east all the chocolates?) She is glaring you down with a soul piercing look. You slowly walk up to her, and initiate the conversation.

"Hey babe, get my..." you don't finish, Emily stands up and slaps you before you can.
"Your chocolates, ya, I got those! As well as your other surprise! When where you going to tell me you were cheating?" she yells as she starts to sob.
"Cheating, I don't..."
"Don't deny it! I went to your room last night."
"When?" you say.
"Around 9."
"I was asleep around nine."
"No one is asleep around nine! That bitch on your bed wasn't!"
"The bitch on my bed?...Emily, I think you were having a bad dream."
"She's wearing the same clothes that you're wearing now! It wasn't a dream!" she sobs as she slaps you again.
"Maybe we should take this someplace private." you say, seeing everyone around you looking at you.
"No, let them hear, let the world hear what a cheating ass you are!"
"But I swear I'm not cheating on..."
"Don't deny it!" she says as she storms away.

Emily was in a rush, she even forgot her text books on the nearby table. You quickly grab them up, planning to give them back to her later. Deciding to skip the second class of today, something tells you your mind wouldn't be focused enough on whatever subject the professor was droning on about today.

Maybe you should see the campuses doctor's clinic, and get these black outs checked out.
1211111211111111.title: Wake up the next day

12111112111111111.content:
