You feel your female self start to pull towards the apple tree, and your male self being pulled towards the peach tree.
"What's going on?" you ask yourself.
"Do you really want to live like this?" asks Emily, as she is suddenly standing right in front of you.
"Of course not." you struggle to say as the parts of you struggle to pull themselves in different directions.
"Then CHOOSE!" she yells.
121211111111.title: Dream a Dream

1212111111111.content:
You wake up to see that you've somehow moved yourself to the top of your blankets, and that you wet your underwear. As you get up to change it though, you notice that the wetness is near the bottom of the undies, not where your penis was pointed. (Odd.)
You look to the other side of the room and notice that Tom is still up. He's looking at something on his computer.
"What are you looking at Tom?" you ask.
"Jeeze." Tom jumps up, half awake, and instinctively tries to cover his screen. "Alex, what are you doing here?"
"I've been here all night." you say.
"But...I...what about the topless woman?!" he says.
"Topless woman?" you ask.
You look at Tom's computer screen, he just uploaded something to a porn site.
"This one." Tom says, pointing to the picture.
There is a picture of a woman on the computer, he's only wearing male underwear around hips, and he hand is down it.
"Is she doing this in her sleep?" you ask.
"I guess." Tom says. "Did you notice her doing it at all?"
"Did I notice what?"
"Never mind, maybe I dreamed that she was here." Tom says, clearly out of it.

You look beside Tom and see that his digital camera is connected to his computer. You look at his cameras gallery, and see a picture of the woman. Tom really did take this picture.

"She looks familiar." you say.
"I thought you brought her? But when you didn't show after midnight, I figured she broke in or something. The picture was proof." Tom says.
"She does kind of look familiar." you say.
"She looks like she could be your twin sister."
You look closer, and then realize that the woman is just wearing the same underwear you just changed out of.
"Oh my god." you think. "She's me!"
1212111111111.title: And you wake up

12121111111111.content:
Your head pieces together what's been going on so far. All of those dreams have been happening since that strange girl kissed you. All the dreams have made you confront the feminine part of yourself in some way. The strange looks you got when you woke up, and now Tom's picture. But for all you know this could be a dream inside of a dream, guys just don't turn into woman, there's no scientific basis behind your transformation. And why does it happen when you're asleep?

You need answers, or a chance to wake up.

'I'd do her.' someone posts under the picture that Tom just uploaded.
You are horrified. "Pig." you think.

'Tom, I'm going to go to sleep.' you say.
'kay.' Tom replies half not caring.
'I need you to watch me.' you tell him.
'Why?' he asks, looking at his monitor instead of you as more comments flood in.
'Because I need to try out a theory. Once I'm asleep, wake me.'
'Why?' he asks.
'It's important Tom.'
'Fine.'

You lay back down in your bed, Tom keeps glancing over at you. You're too tired to even bother going under your sheets. You pass out on top of them.
12121111111111.title: Revolations

121211111111111.content:
You find yourself in a fancy bar, and wearing a revealing white dress with matching accessories. A girl beckons you over to an empty seat at the bar. You walk over and sit beside her.
'Hi.' she says drinking her girly drink.
'Who are you?' you ask her.
'Look at me.' she says her her legs crossed.
'I don't know you.' you admit.
'Try harder, or I'm off and you won't get anything.'
You strain your dreaming head, trying hard to picture where you know her from.
'You're the one who kissed me!'
'Guilty.' she says in a flamboyant manner.
'What happened?' you ask her.
'First...bartender, mix her my special.' she says the the man behind the counter.

The bartender shakes something, drains the liquid into a large cocktail glass and drops a miniature peach in it. He walks over to you and places the drink in front of you.

'Let's have some fun. Every time you take a sip, I answer your question.' the woman says.
'Fine.' you say as you take a sip. It tastes like peach. 'What happened to me when you kissed me?" you ask.
'You became like me.' she said.
'If this is going to work, you're going to have to answer my questions better.' you tell her.
'Hey, I know what's going on.' you tell her.
'Do you?' you ask in a bitchy tone, then take a drink.
'When you say that I became like you, what does that mean?' you ask.
'You became inflicted with the same...I don't want to call it a curse...affliction...When you became inflicted with the same infliction as me, it meant that your horizons had opened to new possibilities that you never wanted.'
'You were in law school weren't you?" you ask.
'Take a drink." she says. You don't, you're not wasting a question on that.
'You were a man.' you tell her. She tries to give no response, but you can tell that she was at one point.
You look at the glass, it's over half empty.
'Tell me everything I need to know about you." you say taking a drink.
'That wasn't a question.' she says.
'I may be in this dress, but I have enough testosterone in me to kick your ass.' you tell her.
'I was Alan. A successful student of law, I had money, and power, and woman found me irresistible. One night, I took the wrong woman home, she was all over me at the bar, but once she found out I'd passed it, she was talking some gibberish about getting her identity back. Told her I'd help her, gave her a quick fuck, and then kicked her out the next morning. I saw her corpse on the evening news. Unidentified woman dead. Later found out it was suicide. I never said a word. Didn't want it coming back to me. Next night I found out that whenever it got dark, my sausage became a pair of eggs.'
'Why? Did that happen to you?' you ask.
'Drink.' she tells you.
You look at your glass and it is empty. You must have been drinking the whole time she was telling her origin story. All that's left is a moist peach.
'What was I drinking?' you ask.
'Estrogen.'

Horrified, you run to the bathroom mirror and see that your features have become cartoonishly female. You have no waist, huge lips, breasts and hips, and you are constantly blinking.
You walk out of there and are going to confront Alice, but the second you leave the woman's washroom, a guy comes from behind you and slaps your ass.
'Hey babe, more where that come from.' he says with a sleazy smile.
121211111111111.title: At the bar

1212111111111111.content:
"Alex, Alex." Tom says as he shakes you.
"I'm up." you tell him.
"It was amazing, your face morphed right in front of my eyes. I wish I had a video camera.
"I think I'm telepathic." you tell him.
"I think you're more than that." says Tom excitedly.

Tom shows you the pictures on his digital camera.
"She's you." Tom says, showing you the pictures.
"She's me? She's me! She's me. I'm her." you repeat to yourself as you go through the pictures.
"Alex, it's like a miracle of science. You need to go to a doctors and get them to do tests on you." he says.
"Tom. They'll just drill me with even more holes. I'm not interested. I just want this cured." you tell him.
"How?" Tom asks.
"In my dreams, I was psychic. I saw the woman who did this to me."
"You did? Are you sure that wasn't a dream?" he asks.
"It felt different than any dream I ever had. This was happening."
"Are you absolutely sure?"
"Yes." you reply with some hesitation.
"The link might still be established." Tom says. "Assuming the other person is still asleep."
"I want to try again." you say.
"Alright." says Tom, and he waits until you fall asleep.
1212111111111111.title: A talk with Tom

12121111111111111.content:
You are walking in the woods, all covered in a red cloak and carrying a basket. All the trees look dead, their branches dry, and leafs shriveled. Each tree seems to have a male face embedded into the bark. The winds whisper 'help me.' over and over as they blow by you. 'turn back.' the occasional voice says. You ignore their warnings as you slowly walk through the near invisible path. It seems that with every step you take forward, your body transforms more and more. You look down to see that your cloak has become tighter. Each step becomes more and more difficult, as your boots morph into heels, and the wind begins to chill you as the legs of your pants seem to mold together as they rise up. The sun is quickly setting too. What would usually take hours is now taking mere minutes. You try walking backwards to see if the changes revert, but there is no such luck. Five minutes into your journey, and your basket is now little more than a coin purse, your outfit, something that would be better suited for a sex shop window than walking the woods.

It wouldn't bother you so much, except that now you have the body to go with the outfit. Looking in a moonlit puddle, you see a sultry face that you refuse to believe is yours.

As you continue, you cannot help but feel that you are being followed. There is a wolf howl in the distance.
You speed up your travel accordingly.

Soon, you see a small stone church through the thicket, it looks as though it is abandoned, but there is a small light barely visible through the window.
Behind you, you can feel the presence of someone stalking you. You slowly turn your head and spot what you assume is a wolf of a man. Standing on two feet in the distance, but silhouetted by the glow of a full moon. He waits, sense you've spotted him. You make a dash for the church.

With a deafening howl, the wolf-man tilts his head back and lets his minions know that he's spotted you.
There's just one course of action left for you to do.
12121111111111111.title: The Wolves Behind You

121211111111111111.content:
You feel a quicker loss of breath, and more concern for your balance as you run. Several times as you run, your breasts almost pop out of the outfit. As you get closer to the church, you notice that your clothes continuously shrink on you until you're nearly naked. Nearly naked because you've still got the hooded cape, and your boots have altered to four inch heels and you can barley move now without being tripped over. You fall, and try hard to slip off the footwear, but being unable too, you quickly get back up and find yourself mere inches from the church.
You frantically knock on the locked door. But the wolves and their leader are just yards behind you.
You hear someone on the other side frantically trying to unlock the door, but as you peak over your shoulder, the wolves are within jumping distance of you.

You close your eyes and hope that your death is a swift one.
121211111111111111.title: RUN!

choices: Create a plan and execute it
1212111111111111111.content:
Suddenly the door in front of you swings open and a arm pulls you inside, shutting immediately once you get it. The door locks itself as a bar is slid over across it.

You look at your rescuer as the wolves bang against the door. The person comes into the light and smiles. It's Alice.
"What are you doing here?" she asks.
"I..I came to see you." you spit out.
"Oh, I see, you came to see me. Dressed like that!"

You look down and suddenly remember that you're completely indecent. (Funny how running for your life makes you forget things like that.) Your hands try and cover your exposed bits, but they're still shaking from the adrenaline.
"Don't bother." says Alice, throwing you an extra skirt that was in her chest. "Not like I can rape you, and lets face it, you don't have anything I haven't seen before."

Alice sits down and lets you put on a blouse that she also had in the chest. She looks calm.

The wolves crash against the door again.
"Why did you sick those on me?" you ask.
"I have nothing to do with the wolves."
"But...what is this place?" you inquire.

Alice pauses for a second, thinking if she should reveal the answer.
"This place, is our dream. A nightmare, a playground of sadistic acts." she says. "But it's our dream."
"Our dream. So we're telepathically linked?"
"You, me, and that." Alice says pointing to the door as a wolf bangs into it once more.
"Don't worry, he can't get in. As far as I can tell, this is a safe zone."
"A safe zone?" you ask.
"In every one of these scenarios, there is a place where that thing can't get us. I don't know why, maybe it has to follow some ancient rules, maybe it doesn't choose these settings.
"So, we're safe here."
"Now we just wait to wake up." Alice says.

"Come out, come out baby girls." growls the wolf through the a tiny crack in the boarded up window.

"Who is he?" you ask.
"He's our owner."
"Our what?!"
"Technically, under some ancient law, he owns us. The curse, that turns you into...well...her...that's a sign of his mark."
"I'm marked?" you ask.
"Yes, and it gets worse too. Soon he'll be able to follow you outside of your sleep.
"Why?" you ask.
"Maybe it's his nature, maybe its how he procreates, I don't know, but the last thing you want to do is let him catch you."

You hear the wolves snapping at something.
"Please, help me. Please." screams a girl in the distance.
You hear a growling and a final wail as you sense the girl is no more.
"Was she...?"
"Yup. She was another one like us...I meet them, occasionally, in these scenarios. There are only two who have lasted longer than me.
"Why did you bring me into this?" you ask Alice. You feel like crying.
"Honestly, I was trying to escape. Pass on the curse and save myself."
"Didn't work, did it?"
"Nope."
"But..."
"What's done is done."
"How did you change when you're awake? I've only been like this, while sleeping."
"You occasionally wake up like this. Lasts for about twenty-four hours, then you remain yourself for the next three days."
"Even in your dreams?" you ask.
"Nope." says Alice with a look of defeat.

You try and look through a hole in the window boards to see if the wolves are out there. You just see a new face morph in the tree nearest to you. It must have been the unlucky girl that just died.

"Run." the wind seems to whisper.

You look back over at Alice.
"What happens in the demon dies in these dreams?" you ask.
"Maybe he'll come back, maybe he'll die. Maybe it'll break the curse."
"Do you want to try and take him out?" you ask.
"Wouldn't you rather be safe?" she replies.

"Run." an unseen voice whispers again.
1212111111111111111.title: Sanctuary?

12121111111111111111.content:
You think about this for a second. People listening to voices in their head, usually end up doing something really stupid, dangerous, and/or illegal.
As much as you want to try and find a solution to your scenario, you just got here and don't know all the facts. You just stop and think.
"I'd rather be safe." you say to Alice.

You're surprised how much it hurts to say this. Something inside of you wanted to take control of this situation, now agreeing with her you're shifting your weight behind your authority. As a thunderous 'bang' comes against the door, you stop caring.

After all, Alice obviously has more experience in surviving in the dream state than you do, and she also has had more time to learn how to use her body, something you're not entirely used to doing.

"So do we wait out this until we wake up?" you ask.
"We just wait until sunrise."
"That's it?"
"Yes."

What feels like an hour has passed, as the impacts against the house become lesser, until they stop completely.
After a few moments of silence, you peek through a pinhole in the wall, and see absolutely nothing.

"Why didn't you run?" asks the unseen whisper.

Suddenly, you feel weird, even for you, as something seems to tickle your veins.
"Is there any consequence for staying in one spot too long?" you ask.
"I don't think there is."

You feel itchy, and start to scratch your skin. To your horror, hair is starting to grow on you. Man, does growing hair itch! You nails grow as your fingers curb forwards.

You look at Alice, but she isn't changing, she's just looking at you in horror.
"What's going on?" you try and say, as your vocal sounds become little more than growls.
Alice runs into the corner on the opposite side of the room as you.
Your fangs now clash upon each other as you stare at the frightened woman who got you into this whole mess.
Although you as still managing to stand on two legs, you resemble a wolf, much more than you do a human.
"Shit, he must have scratched you before I let you in." Alice cries.
You want to go over to her, and comfort her, telling her everything is going to be alright.
But as you reach out towards her, your arm slaps your claw against her face, dropping her instantly.

You look at her corpse, as it falls to the floor, it becomes male again. Snorting, you make your way out of the building and let a giant howl as you enter the woods.
"What am I doing? I have to get out of here." you think.
As you slowly make your way through the forest, you spot Alice's face on a tree. You observe it for a second, as you turn around to see the giant wolf transform back into a man once more. He stands before you naked.
"You have no idea how long it too me to get that bitch." he says smiling.
You look at him, unsure what your wolf-like expression is saying.
"Claw to hand, take my hand, he says reaching out his arm towards your paw. "I can undo this for you."
12121111111111111111.title: Stay here

121211111111111111111.content:
You slowly place you claw on his hand, being careful not to scratch him. Finally, someone is going to undo all these stupid transformations you've went through.
As your hands touch, you can feel a dark magic leave from you, as you shrink a bit and regain a human form. "I'm naked." you think, but all you do is give a smile of gratitude.
The man brushes your long hair out to the side of your eyes. "There is little difference between hair and fur." he growls.
"Can you change me to a man again?" you think as you stare at him. "Indeed." your body says.

"Then I have undone all I wish to." says the man. "Walk with me."
Feeling like you don't have a choice in the matter, you follow the naked man towards some still water.
"Do you like what you see?" he asks.
You stare into the water, seeing your reflection. You look like a hot female version of yourself, much more attractive than you thought, but your eyes, they're yellow, like a wolf's.
"Do you like what you see?" the man asks again.
"I can't see well." you tell him.
"Bend over, look closer." he says as he walks behind you.
Feeling exceptionally vulnerable, you lean towards the pond.
A ripple comes over your reflection as you see something closer beneath.
As your eyes focus, you see your male body drowned in the water.
"Like what you see?" asks the man standing right behind you.
Suddenly, you feel a rush, as your brain goes into an overload of the senses.
121211111111111111111.title: Take his hand

1212111111111111111111.content:
Like a whiplash, you throw yourself up from the bed and land right towards Tom. Before either of you know what's happening, you find yourselves lip locked. Tom quickly pushes you off him. "What the hell?!" he shouts, making you fall back on your bed. The impact feels weird, and you notice that you're still female. "But I'm awake!" your mind protests.

"I'm sorry honey." you say. What the hell, you didn't want to say that!
"Dude, go check a mirror." Tom says as he harshly wipes off his lips.

You silently go towards the bathroom and look in the mirror. Your reflection plays with your hair. "What the hell is this? I don't want to play with my hair!" you shout. But your reflection just responds to your protests with a seductive voice: "I like what I see."

Its yellow eyes stare at the mirror, and suddenly, your mind feels like it's drowning underwater, observing a creature it no longer controls.

"Jeeze, Tom. I'm sorry about what just happened." she says, as she spots him through the open door of the mirror's reflection.
"Don't mention it...ever." Tom says.
"Let me make it up to you." she replies with a cruel grin on her face.

You try to shout, to get any message across to your former body, but your thoughts feel like they're eternally drowning, and now, even to yourself, they're muffled.
1212111111111111111111.title: Wake up!

121211111111111111112.content:
You are a warped bi-pedal monstrosity, he is a naked man. You can take this guy. With your claw, you slash right through his face, as he falls into the dirt ground. Instincts come over you as you start clawing and biting his corpse. Suddenly, a twig snaps, and you look up to see at least twelve wolf-like creatures like yourself, all much larger and stronger than you.

They circle around you, becoming even less human and more wolf-like, until they are talking on all fours and spread out.
The face of Alice on the tree seems to smile at you, until it reverts into ordinary bark.
A light comes over the horizon, and you have trouble keeping your eyes open as the world around you begins to disappear.

"Alex. Alex.--Wake up!" you hear Tom say as he slightly shakes your body.
"What?" you seem to mumble as your eyes try and adjust to the light.
"You...You haven't changed back." Tom says, concerned.
"Let me see!" you body says as it jumps up, almost falling forward, due to the stupid shift in your center gravity."

After a minute of searching around your room, you finally manage to make it to the bathroom.
As you fail to turn on the lightswitch, you come to the terrible realization, you're no longer in control of you own body!
The body slams the door behind it, and flips the switch, illuminating the mirror in front of you.

A long haired beauty stares back at you with her curvacious form and smile, as she puckers her lips and blows a mock kiss at the reflection.
"You didn't think it would be that easy to kill me?" she says.
You try and yell, or thing of anything to respond with, but it's pointless, you've already lost all control.

The reflection fondles her breasts for a bit.
"Like that?" she asks you.
"I thought all guys liked that. Let's find out."
121211111111111111112.title: Consiquences

12121111111111111112.content:
You formulate a plot in your head.
"Do you notice something odd about the air?" you ask Alice.
"That it's not really there?"
"No, that it is harder to breath than usual."
"That's maybe because your lungs are smaller."
"OR it's because we're high up in the mountains.
"We're in a forest you dumb slut!" she snaps. "I'm sorry, I don't know what made me do that." she says.
"You want to escape him? Fall off a cliff. You'll wake up. If he's linked here more than we are, that fall might make him crippled in some way. It's a wooded land, but its on a mountain, I can smell it."
"It could work. You just need him to hit the ground before we both wake up." says Alice sportingly.

Suddenly the whole building shakes.
"No more playing around." the wolf thunders.

"Is there another way out?" you ask Alice.
"I've been in this dream before, there is a tiny wine cellar that has a back exit at a the bottom of a tree, thirty yards from here."
"Lets do it." you say.

Alice lifts up a latch hidden in the floorboards. The two of you quickly descend into darkness. A small candle lights up the room. It's filled with barrels of whine. Two minutes, after bumping around in the dark, Alice finally comes across a ladder.
"I'm going to open this hatch." says Alice. "When I do, we'll have about a minute before they catch out scent. How fast can you run?"

You look at your footwear, you're not hopeful of your chances.
"Looks like you'll be the distraction." says Alice. "Just try to keep them alive while I take the big one to a cliff or drop off of some kind."
"Okay." you say, as your brain starts to wonder if this was such a good idea. From being in a dream-state and having your head start to get flooded with hormones that you're not used to, you're not really in the state of mind to risk this.

It's too late to go back though. Alice creaks the hatch open and the cool night air floods in, snuffing out the candle.
She looks at you.
"Ready, set..."
12121111111111111112.title: Create a plan and execute it

121211111111111111121.content:
Alice makes a sprint for the trees. (Damn her sensible footwear.) You find you catch a bit of a break, the wind is at your back, the wolves can't smell you as you stumble your way across the wooded area.
You hear a snap beneath your feet and you look down to see that you have carelessly broken a small branch. The wolves ears prick up as they hear the sound you just made.

Seeing the wolves look in your direction, you bolt for it. At least you try to. You suck at running like a girl, and running in heels. At least this time your clothes are shrinking around you. Trying to run with inhuman speed, you see if you can make it to the treeline. You notice that there is none. The forest seems to go on forever.

It's a dream, the environment is changing around you, but the wolves aren't changing, they're just chasing you. As you run down a hill, you trip and fully expect the wolves to devour you. To your pleasant surprise, the wolves run past you towards where Alice was headed.

You get up, confused, but before you can continue, the wolf-man appears beside you and swipes a gash in your arm. And it stings.
The beast picks you up and pins you against a tree, and it snarls and brings its razor-like teeth right in front of your face.
On the bark beside you, an image starts to morph into the trunk and forms a face like Alice's.

So that's why the wolves passed you.

"There is no escape." says the wolf-man, as he opens his jaw, ready to bite.
121211111111111111121.title: A plan in motion

1212111111111111111211.content:
You're pretty sure you just wet yourself, and think of what a humiliating way this is to die, as the beast prepares to feast on your flesh.

Suddenly, as the beast strikes a flying rock his him in the side of his eye. The wolf-man instinctively drops you and turns around to see what caused this. He sees nothing, but sprints in that direction he was hit.

Not being an idiot, you run like there is no tomorrow, even in your ridiculous heels, you manage to make it to a thick bush, where you maneuver your way in the moonlight.

As you come through the other side, you see the corpse of Alice lying, half eaten, and half naked. Her clothes shredded with her skin, lying on the forest floor.

"Alice. Alice." you say as you gently shake her. There is no response and you immediately check her pockets to see if there is anything that could be of help. There is a make-up bag with a compact mirror in it. The mirror seems to be made of silver, and you figure you'll take it. With the person who got you into this mess seemingly dead at your feet, you go to find some higher ground and get this sorted out.

You go up a rather large slope and receive a second of jubilation as you see a steep drop off. You turn around, if your plan doesn't work, you can always jump down and wake up.

You jump as you think you see something in the bushes, but realize that it isn't a wolf you're spotting. A human hand grabs something off Alice that you missed and disappears back into the bushes.

You realize that whoever threw that stone had the same plan you did.

What happens next is too amazing for the modern English language to do justice too. But needless to say, you're plan succeeds. As you and the Wolf-Man plung off the cliff towards the rocks below, you see your male self looking over the ledge as the wolf takes a huge bite out of your neck, and everything goes dark as you feel a sudden impact.
1212111111111111111211.title: The Fall

12121111111111111112111.content:
When you open your eyes, you are peering at the Wolf-Man's corpse below you, laying on top of your body. You then realize that you are a man again.
Suddenly, the forest fades around you, and your eyes grow heavy.

You wake up with Tom standing terrified on the other side of the room?

"What's wrong?" you ask Tom.
Tom points at the floor beside your bed. There lies an strange looking man, not moving. His face is covered in shadows, and his face produces an otherworldly aura. In your mind, he resembles the wolf-man that was in your dream.

Your look goes from horror to disgust as you see his belt and zipper were undone.

Tom is sitting in the corner, holding a broken wooden baseball bat.
"I think I killed him." he says.
"How did he get in here." you ask.
"He pushed the door in."
Your eyes see the door is broken.
"Damn." you say.
"Indeed." says the man as he hops up to his feet.
In fear, both you and Tom shout some obscenities.
The man touches your shoulder, and you feel pain where the wolf bit it.
"You...You're no longer mine." says the strange man in surprise.
Before you can respond, the man turns around towards Tom and walks towards him.
"But you...No man has laid a finger on me in over three centuries. That is a crime that I will not allow to go unpunished." he says as his right index finger pokes a shaking Tom on the forehead.

But before he can do anything more, a single beam of light bursts through the window and on the wall of the other side of your room.

"It's an injustice I will solve another night." croaks the strange man as he fades into nothing.

"Alex, I'm scared." Tom says.

You look down, you're you.
"I'm cured." you say.
12121111111111111112111.title: A Conclusion

121211111111111111121111.content:
As it turns out, you really were cured. You never had a dream about being a female again.

Tom was not so lucky. A week after your apartment was broken into, Tom started getting similar dreams to the ones you were experiencing, and would undergo physical changes whenever he fell asleep or drank alcohol.
Once a week, you'd even have to stay up and fend off the stranger as he tried to get into your dorm. It was no relief for either of you.

One day, you fell asleep before Tom, and when you woke up, you never saw him again. To make matters worse, the campus refused to give you your deposit on the room.

After Tom's disappearance, Emily started to hang out with you more, and your relationship made it to the next level.

Before you died, you looked back and thought that this year in campus was the weirdest one in your life.
121211111111111111121111.title: Epilogue

12121111111111111112112.content:
You wake up with a sudden squeal, and are terrified to find a woman's voice coming out of your throat. You look down to see a firm pair of breasts over part of your rib-cage. You instantly grab your hair. It isn't any longer than usual, but it defiantly feels different, silkier.
"Tom!" you shout.
"What?!" says Tom instantly waking up from his chair. He must have fallen asleep in it when he was supposed to be watching over you. (That jerk!)
"Jeez, Alex!" he says.
"What happened?!" you both blurt out at once.
"There was this fog, or haze, the longer I watched you, the more it came over me. Soon, my eyes had to struggle to stay open. I tried to wake you, before I blacked out. I guess I failed."

You run to the bathroom and look at yourself in the mirror. It sucks. You look like you did in the dream. You lock the door, and realize that you must now sit down to take a piss.

"Are you okay?" Tom asks as he hears you sobbing.
"Go away!" you shout through your crying. You don't know why or when you started crying, only that you're crying now, and its helping you deal with these emotions that are surfacing.

Suddenly the bathroom lights begin to flicker on and off. You force yourself to stop crying long enough to see the light-bulb go out.
You try flipping the light switch on and off, but have no luck. You try opening the door, but find that it won't move.
"Hello?! Tom?! Are you there?! Please answer!" you yell.

"He can't hear you." says a voice.
You're almost afraid to ask, but can't seem to help yourself. "Who are you?" you say.
Your eyes adjust to see the wolf-man standing on the other corner of the room.
"I'm still sleeping!" you realize.
"No." the thing corrects you. "You are as awake now as you ever were."
"I don't understand." you whimper, still short of breath from crying.
"You woke into my realm. You sleep in it. I am your everything."

There is an uncomfortable silence, the wolf-man is unmoving, he does not have to do a thing, he is obviously in control of this situation.
Even though you are inside, you suddenly feel a winter's wind blow, followed by a clear draft.

"Look down." growls the wolf-man.
Your eyes peer down to see your female body completely naked. You're still so alien in it, you don't even try and cover yourself. What's the point?

The wolf-man walks closer...
"Submit." he says.

...

"No." you respond.

The wolf-man walks closer, until his hand is on your shoulder.

"Submit." he whispers in your ear.

The next thing you remember is blacking out.
12121111111111111112112.title: waking up one last time

choices: WAKE UP!  FOR THE LOVE OF...JUST WAKE UP!
1212111111111111112.content:
You expect the pain of cut flesh and crushed bone to overtake you, but two wolves pounce in the air and pin your back to the ground. You try to struggle, but you're much to weak in your current appearance to put up a fight. Plus the wolves grinding their teeth centimeters in front of your face gives you enough of a reason to stay still. You look up as the two legged beast towers over you. Like you, he is also completely naked, except he has a necklace of some kind around his neck.
He smiles a cruel smile. You know it's a male from the parts that are dangling over you. He bends over and with one arm, slams you against the church. "Ouch!" you whine in your pitiful feminine voice. (Aren't dreams supposed to not hurt you?")
"My, my." growls the wolf in a low, raw voice. "What is a woman like you doing undressed like that in my forest?"
You try to respond, but the wolf's grip on your throat is too tight.
"Maybe you were just seeking some company." says the wolf, as it brushes its free hand up the side of your leg.
Again, you cannot respond.
"You are in my domain, you were tagged by me, I smell it. I can sense my aura on you, tainted as it may be."
You try harder to struggle, as the wolf moves himself closer, and something else brushes against your leg. You're convinced it's not his free hand.
"I'm dreaming. I'm dreaming. WAKE UP!" you tell yourself.
"I bet you're telling yourself this is just a bad dream. So many others believed that too. Now they are all trophies in my forest.

You feel something odd, and before you know it, you're paralyzed against the wall, unable to remove or respond.
You remain looking at the wolves face as he throws you to the ground and howls as he jumps on top of you.
"Thing about dressing like that in these woods. Women only do it if they're about to become my bitch."
The monster starts rapidly panting. As he lowers down over you.
1212111111111111112.title: The wolves get you

12121111111111111121.content:
"I'm up. I'm up!" you say as Tom repeatedly shakes you. It's morning and you're exhausted.
Tom falls back off the bed as you sit up.
"What?" you ask looking at him on the floor. Then your eye's are directed to the new weight that is on your chest.
"Oh." you say in defeat.
"WHAT THE HELL?!" Tom yells.
You calmly get up and walk buy him towards the bathroom. Your movement is weird, your legs are instinctively trying to separate enough to protect testicles that you no longer have. You get to the mirror and see you have hair down to your elbows.
"I should probably do something about this." you say to yourself.
"NO SHIT!" yells Tom.
12121111111111111121.title: What happens in dreams...

121211111111111111211.content:
The next few moths are rough. As if your magical overnight sex-change wasn't enough, you're not female during all times of the day too. Your identity has been tied up in a legal battle, as the courts are trying to use you as an example against back-alley operations. If that wasn't enough, you shock everyone with the news that you're pregnant, despite you claiming to be a virgin. (There is no way to win this one.) Later on, you give birth, (much to the shock of the entire world) to quintuplets. Congratulations, it's a litter.

The babies are completely aggressive and wander everywhere, as the country's top medical scientists examine you ever hour of the day.
The only chance for peace you get is in your sleep, and even then, nine times out of ten, it involves a dark monster of some type chasing you down.
121211111111111111211.title: Epilogue

13.content: Congratulations, you have just survived a kiss by a strange woman with no consequences what soever. As time goes by, this will be something that you bring up with your buddies at a bar. No one had heard of anything similar happening at the campus before, and no reports of anything like it happened again. Still at night, sometimes you vaguely remember her face. You're not sure if it was romantic, or creepy. You're not sure if you helped some co-ed live out her fantasies, or if you were on the receiving end of someone's initiation ritual to some demented college group. All you know is that you're glad you didn't get mono.
13.title: Nothing happens at all.

131.content: Welcome to the additional information section about the writing of this piece, filled with notes, F.A.Q's and anything else I can think of regarding the story.
131.title: Welcome to the bonus section

1312.content:
Here is the frequently asked questions section, which should more accurately be called the question and answer section, since none of the questions could be considered frequently asked.

Question (Q): What made you come up with this idea?
Answer (A): I've had this idea for some time, but there are a lot of people who had it first. The origin from this comes from a webcomic I wrote (no, I'm not telling which one,) where the only female character in it was going to turn into a man during the full moon. Unfortunately, the webcomic died before I finished the first arc, (but I wish the artist the best of luck,) so the idea never happened there. Plus I always wanted to make a choose your own adventure book, since I read them a lot as a kid and teen, and wanted to see if I could pull it off. The format on this site was the closest I'll probably ever get to making one.

Q: What genre does this come under?
A: At first, it was supposed to be a comedy, where I'd play up the threat just like a werewolf movie. But in traditional werewolf stories, the monsters lose almost all control of their impulses when transformed. That wouldn't work as well for an interactive adventure. So I tried to keep the comedy but getting the main character (Alex) to go through increasingly uncomfortable tasks. As the chapters grew, I needed to find a way for him to either get cured or be stuck in his condition. It was more fun to keep him trapped and miserable, so it became a horror.

Q: How much of this story did you plot out?
A: I originally tried to plot out about 200 choices going over 3 main story lines, but it felt to stringent and limiting, so after writing 2/3rds of the first major story arc, I improvised the rest.

Q: Who is your favorite character?
A: My favorite character was the one that I never intended to write, the Dark Stranger (a.k.a. the dark man,) I was bored writing similar paths with minor changes, and I originally wanted Alex's curse to be the only supernatural thing about the fictional universe that he was in. One day I got bored and wrote about a strange figure that attacks Alex out of nowhere. It was the most interesting the story had been since I started it, so I made sure he kept popping up.

Q: Are the characters based off of anyone?
A: Nope, I tried hard to do as little description as possible to the characters and locations in this story. You fill their descriptions in on your own. It's more fun to imagine people who you know (and probably hate) filling all of the roles. Although I did meet a women named Alex who dresses and acts a lot like a man after I started writing this.

Q: I see a lot of reoccurring characters and they act slightly different in every path. What is canon?
A: Nothing about the curse is canon, it changes to keep the story interesting for the reader (and the writer,) as for characters and their relationships, if it's mentioned in two separate story threads and not contradicted, it's canon. My original goal was to write a bunch of incomplete stories where you'd have to read each choice in order to get the whole story. I kind of kept that, but the changing nature of the curse made it hard to keep with that original goal. Still, you can get a sense of the larger tapestry in Alex's universe by picking the different choices and seeing what is revealed.

Q: I'm unhappy about where you left a storyline hanging, I want to read more of that story.
A: I did leave some story lines prematurely, because I wanted to do a similar story on another path/thread. If enough people want a story to be continued, and I still have a few ideas on how to make Alex miserable, I'll continue it for you. Otherwise, feel free to continue where the story left off by starting your own sequel.

Q: There is a noticeable lack of sex/intercourse, dressing up, and the main character enjoying the situation, why didn't you make Alex have more fun with it?
A: Because personally, I find transformation stories terrifying. The body shifting itself to an alien form, the new expectations placed on the character, the mystery (and usually magical) nature of the transformation is something more suitable to horror than fetish material. The other reason is that every time to have a tg/tf story, those aspects get focused on WAY too often.

Q: If Alex and Tom are so short on money, how come they have a dorm room with a personal bathroom in it?
A: It's true that personal bathrooms are rare for dorm rooms and the ones that have them are usually much too expensive for people who have Tom and Alex habits to afford. But for the stories sake, the situation posed more opportunities with the character to get out of strange situations if they had access to their own bathroom. I'll just note too that for a lot of this story to work, Tom and Alex's dorm room would need to be three times wider in length than the average one you find on campuses in North America. This relies on the suspension of disbelief, but if you can suspend it for the curse and it's effects, hopefully, you'll suspend your disbelief for Tom and Alex's living style too.

Q: Why don't you let other people write in these stories?
A: Because I know how it's going to go down, there will be two or three writers with similar tastes writing the story, but then they'll leave most their plots unfinished. Then there will be a lot of other writers who won't have the patience for description, or will just focus on the character doing crude acts for the sake of it. Again, I apologize to a few of you I know wanted to do this, but there are LOTS of other stories on this site with the same theme you can participate in.

Q: This is a cool story and I want to add to it or adapt it, what can I do?
A: I'm always looking to show off new artists, if you have original illustrations that fit something that's going on in the story, just email me and I'll be more than happy to link to your webpage/deviant art account. If you want to continue the story of the characters, go for it! If you're writing a similar story and want to use a situation or transformation described, that's cool too. Just don't outright copy and paste it.

Q: The rating on this story is wierd, most of it's non-offensive.
A: That's not a question, but yes. I wrote it to be a light PG story with sudden chapters that earned an R rating. This kept a sense of dread over how far the story would go, and the reader is always waiting for the dagger to drop.
1312.title: F.A.Q.

1313.content:
Hey if you enjoyed this, there are a lot of other books and movies out there that you'll probably enjoy. (Many of which inspired this interactive story.)


Books:

Curse of the Were-Woman, The: This book beat me to the title, and isn't that good. It works as its own B-Movie romantic comedy, but it's not that great. Still, if you're into TF stories there are some cheap laughs.

H.P. Lovecraft, the works of: The slow pace and gradual transformation, as well as the atmosphere and feeling of no way out are partially inspired by the works of this giant of the horror genre.

Metamorphosis: Kafka's take of a man who wakes up a giant cockroach and how he struggles to adapt to his new life.

Orlando: Virginia Wolfe's most readable book about an immortal boy who one day wakes up to be an immortal girl.

Ovid's Metamorphoses: A list of every transformation in mythology from Adam's rib to Ceasar's supposed godhood

Ranma 1/2: Possibly the most famous Japanese comic about a boy becoming a girl, if you enjoy slapstick humor around this subject, this series is a must.


Web comics:

El Goonish Shive: It's a weird comic, but it deals a lot in transformations, and mysteries and magical creatures making the lives of our heroes miserable.

The Werewif: A young man's life gets complicated when a woman bites him in a bar.


Movies/TV Shows:

Dr. Jekyll & Mrs. Hyde: There are a lot of different versions of this movie, none are really that good. Still work seeing some if you're into the transformation sequences. (Although you can find the best clips online)

Quantum Leap: A scientist keeps jumping into other people's bodies in the past in order to make history better.
1313.title: Recommended Reading/Viewing

info.brief_description: Strange things start to happen to a student when a mysterious girl kisses him.
info.description:
This is a PG story, but because of the odd scene and curse word, I've rated it PG-13.
I wanted to see if it was possible to create a story like this, doing most of the chapters myself; it's long repetitive and boring. I realized that I went a whole year without updating, so now someone else can continue it.

Please note that the interactive story is split up into two important parts:
If you choose for the transformation to happen right away, it should be a quick fun story, don't think to hard, there are no long lasting consequences, and it should be finished when the night is over.

If you choose the transformation not happening right away, than the story will be much longer, have more consequences, be more fleshed out, and the characters should act more realistically.

There are over 300 chapters to read, so it should take you a while to get through all the choices. This whole project took over a year to create.


Some rules:

1) no choice only chapters, write at least 700 characters before giving the reader the options.

2) I reserve the right to delete and chapters I find inappropriate, and edit any chapters for bad grammar and spelling. (The rating is currently 13+, but if your additions are good enough, I'll alter the rating).

3) Some choices come to an abrupt end, if you want those choices continued, message me and I'll alter the chapters so you can continue them.

4) Know where you're going with the chapters. You don't need a detailed storyline, just know where you're going.

5) Wait 5 days before continuing someone else's latest addition.

6) Try and keep to the spirit of the story, but definatly keep the same narrative technique of talking directly to the reader.

7) Have fun.

8) (Bracketed sentences are the narrator's thoughts, and usually put in to lighten a situation.)

Characters list:

Alexander: The hero (and later heroine) of the story. He's an undeclared University student, who lives with his buddy Tom, and has problems with his on again off again girlfriend, Emily. His physical appearance is purposely not described.

Tom: Alexander's roomate and highschool friend. Tom is athletic, but not the brightest individual. He wouldn't describe himself as a ladies' man but the women still love him.

Emily: Alexander's on-again-off-again girlfriend. She lives on the other end of the campus with her friend Amy. She is caring, but hides it with her silent strength. Something is concerning her, but she won't say what.

Amy: Emily's roommate. She's girly. She likes dresses and make-up and talking about boys. She wants to be a beauty expert. She doesn't realize that Emily and most other people don't like her that much.

Alice/Alan: The strange woman that kissed Alex, and the initial reason for his transformation. She seems like she wants to help him, but can she be trusted? What's her real plan?

Supporting characters:

The Dark Man/Stranger: He is the mysterious man with mysterious powers who is after Alex once Alex gets cursed, what does he want? What are his powers? Who is he really? No one knows for sure. Try and keep Alex away from him unless you want to end the storyline.

Brian: He is a mythology major and possibly one of the smartest people in the schools. If anyone can find out how to cure Alex, it's him. Unfortunately, he's not used to being around other people.
info.pretty_title: Curse of the Campus Co-Ed Were-Woman
